Index: 2
some fonts not shown until a redraw
originally reported on google code with id 1285

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. set up a deck that uses some special fonts. see below
2. after starting ankidroid, start reviewing
3.

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?
all text from the card should appear.
instead, only parts of the text appears at first.
when the card is redrawn, for example after rotating the tablet, the text missing at
first is finally shown

does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?
i am not quite sure. it may not happen every time, but quite frequently.


what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look
at the title)
on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version)
android 4.0.3
ankidroid 2.0.beta11


if it is a crash or "force close" and you can reproduce it, the following
would help immensely: 1) install the "sendlog" app, 2) reproduce the crash,
3) immediately after, launch sendlog, 4) attach the resulting file to this
report. that will make the bug much easier to fix.


please provide any additional information below.

i have attached one deck/model/card where i saw this problem.

the first image shows only a german word.
for the second image , i just rotated the tablet by 90‚Å∞. now there are two lines of
text. the upper line should have been there in the first image , too.

the ipapmincho font of the first image can be found at http://ossipedia.ipa.go.jp/ipafont/index.html
the font of the german text (demos lt) is a commercial font that i won't attach.

```

Index: 4

maybe also when you plan to build a seperate viewer app
Index: 5
frequent cpu spikes lead to battery drain
as mentioned in https://github.com/simplemobiletools/simple-calendar/issues/861, there seems to be something that triggers simple calendar (and calendar storage) to both spike cpu usage simultaneously and continuously (every few seconds). in my setup i have 2 accounts enabled (google and exchange). the cpu spike can start occurring almost immediately after installing the app and enabling caldav, or randomly within an hour of installing the app.

logcat shows the following trace simultaneously with the cpu spikes:

```
04-06 23:28:11.391 e/databaseutils(12831): writing exception to parcel
04-06 23:28:11.391 e/databaseutils(12831): java.lang.illegalargumentexception: color type: 0 and index -1 does not exist for account.
04-06 23:28:11.391 e/databaseutils(12831): at com.android.providers.calendar.calendarprovider2.verifycolorexists(calendarprovider2.java:4488)
04-06 23:28:11.391 e/databaseutils(12831): at com.android.providers.calendar.calendarprovider2.updateintransactioninner(calendarprovider2.java:4285)
04-06 23:28:11.391 e/databaseutils(12831): at com.android.providers.calendar.calendarprovider2.updateintransaction(calendarprovider2.java:4185)
04-06 23:28:11.391 e/databaseutils(12831): at com.android.providers.calendar.sqlitecontentprovider.update(sqlitecontentprovider.java:155)

04-06 23:28:11.391 e/databaseutils(12831): at android.content.contentprovider$transport.update(contentprovider.java:420)
```

Index: 6

hello,

Index: 7
number keys on standard layout remains the same even after disenabling it
#### expected behavior
the number keys on standard layout , ought not to show again after disenabling it on the application settings.

#### actual behavior
number keys on standard layout , still shows even after disenabling it, after click the option menu on the keyboard.

#### how to reproduce
- download and install the application [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vlath.keyboard)
- lunch the application
- click on enable, enable behe keyboard, then click ok
- press back
- click on select
- choose behe keyboard
- click on settings, disable number keys on standard layout
- press back
- on the test box, type some words
- click on the option in the keyboard
- click on it again

and the number on keys comes back automatically.




application version: 1.1.3
operating system: android v7.0

#### recording of the bug
https://youtu.be/zq9ngqrl2pe
Index: 8
add more control over the 'flags' feature
this is not really a bug, but rather a usability issue for myself and quite a few people i know who use ankidroid.

we now have flags, i believe introduced in 2.9 for the no-beta community. i have no issue with that in general, it's just that it doesn't integrate into my way of using ankidroid (pretty much the only version i do reviews with).

they are very prominent in the reviewer ui , for me too much so for a feature that i never use (i do acknowledge others might use them, i'm just expressing my own feelings about them). they moved my beloved star to be a second class citizen ;) now, i never use flags, my workflow was to mark any card needing attention using a star ('marked' tag). i did this because i was able to use a gesture (double tap in my case) for this. there is also a ready-made 'marked' filter on anki desktop sidebar, which is the anki version i mostly use for editing, just a click away. there was also a ready-made filter for 'marked' cards in ankidroid. all of this worked really nice and was quick.

i understand that i have been misusing the star for what should really be a flag. i couldn't care less whether the symbol is a star, a flag, or a turtle, i cared about the gesture and filters. here are some thought on how to make it better:

1. allow disabling the flags in settings. if i disable flags, the icon goes to the previous spot. this will make ankidroid the way it used to be (for me). shouldn't be too much hassle to place the icons differently based on a boolean flag? (just guessing.)
2. allow defining gestures for flags (like list all the different flag colors in the list, and let me assign double tap to red, orange and other colors). also add pre-made filters in the browser for them. this will also make ankidroid the way it used to be for me, although with a different icon , which i couldn't care less about. this option doesn't make anki desktop the way it used to be, so i guess i will head over there to have a sidebar filter added.
Index: 9
room upgrade support
this is a meta issue for the support of room upgrade. it lists all we need to do.

the ux and the design can be the same as riot-android. that may worth to check if the new icons used by riot-web in the banners can fit on a mobile app.

the implementation must support upgrade through federation. that has been implemented lately on riot-android (see https://github.com/vector-im/riot-android/issues/3204 and corresponding prs).

check list:
- [x] display a banner in the old room
- [x] automatically join the new room when the user taps on this banner
- [x] use the sender server name in the `/join` request (existing issue #303)
- [x] display a banner to the new room that links to the old room
- [x] show only the new room in rooms lists (existing issue #246)
- [ ] check if we can use new icons from riot-web

reported by `will.barnard3` on 2013-10-09 02:56:49

Index: 12
proposal: to update the custom android apps with bug-fixes on the 2.4 release
our most recent releases for the custom apps range from august to december 2018. afaik they're based on release 2.4 of the main kiwix android app. the crash rates for many of these apps is far higher than either we'd like, and they also exceed google's threshold for the maximum crash rate (1.09%)

here's the current statistics for our custom apps with at least 1000 active installs.

custom app | 30 day active users | rating | crash rate | new installs | uninstalls
------------ | --------------------- | ------ | ----------- | ------------ | ----------
wikimed | 57,388 | 4.62 | 1.53% | 3,280 | 7,660
phet | 36,786 | 4.56 | 2.93% | 8,250 | 9,620
arabic wikimed | 16,709 | 4.51 | 3.86% | 4,780 | 5,080
wikimed mini | 15,321 | 4.51 | 1.98% | 3,470 | 4,200
wikimed fr | 13,365 | 4.40 | 1.33% | 1,190 | 2,280
wikimed de | 6,728 | 4.67 | 2.38% | 601 | 809
wikivoyage | 6,572 | 4.76 | 1.64% | 548 | 895
wikimed es | 5,611 | 4.56 | 2.12% | 804 | 1,280
wikimed zh | 4,053 | 4.50 | n/a | 490 | 744
wikimed fa | 2,823 | 4.66 | n/a | 277 | 580
wikimed ja | 1,592 | 4.57 | n/a | 160 | 257

a couple of observations:

1. according to android vitals we are losing many more users than we gain
2. there is significant 'churn' of the user-base

i believe a bug-fix release - that includes bugs we believe we have a viable fix for - may help us reduce the crash rate for these apps significantly. the amount will vary depending on the app as the crashes and frequencies vary between the apps, nonetheless i'd hope to see at least 1/3rd fewer crashes, and perhaps we may halve the crash rates for some of these apps relatively easily and safely.

from what i can ascertain, existing users would only receive a new binary ( approximately 15mb) without needing to download the content again.

for some of the apps we could also consider updating the content, however i'd suggest we hold-off from doing so initially as that would make the installation larger. also, if we're using the 2.4 release as the codebase (as i suggest) keeping the zim file unchanged reduces the need and risk of compatibility issues with more recent zim files.

**describe alternatives you've considered**
i've considered either using 2.5.3 or waiting for a 3.x release for the custom apps. using 2.5.x as the baseline would introduce other changes to the app and the ui which may cause additional challenges and complications. i know there are some issues with the 2.5.x codebase for custom apps. see #1369 for an example, there will be others i expect.

waiting for 3.x will involve additional work and changes in order to provide revised and enhanced custom apps. my preference is to release this bug-fix release in the interim to help retain and support our users currently and in the coming weeks and months.

**additional context**
i have tested and documented the custom app build process (in gradle) and believe we should be able to cherry-pick the bug-fixes that are in 2.5.3 together with fixes for #1399 to create the revised binaries.

Index: 13
no menu button: opening menu with a swipe and swiping tabs sometimes collides
as the phone's menu button does not open the menu anymore and there's also no menu button in the gui , the only way to open it is by swiping from the left border of the phone's display. often enough it happens, that i accidentally swipe tabs when i really want to open up the menu. so there should be a menu button in the gui and maybe also the phone's menu button (if the phone has one) should open the menu.

twidere 0.3.0 dev 2015-03-29 / android 4.3 / samsung galaxy s3

Index: 14
inconsistent behavior of loadkeyboard()
hello

the method loadkeyboard() from the keyboardswitcher.java is called when the keyboard appears, which makes sense. but i just realized now that this method is called twice when the screen is turned off (using the hardware button) when the keyboard is still visible. this does not make sense to me. when the keyboard is closed by changing the context (e.g. switching to other app or to home screen ) then the loadkeyboard() method is not called, which is correct.

how can i determine if the call to loadkeyboard() is really from opening the keyboard or if it is from turning off the screen ? i would like to store the current setting of the keyboard in my own database everytime the keybaord pops up (but not when screen is turned off).

or else how can i detect that the keyboard is closed (also when screen is just turned off)?
Index: 15
german: add "german+" layout
similar to how there is a "german broad" and a "german broad +" layout , there should be a keyboard with extra pop-ups that uses the standard "german" layout . (the one with √§,√∂, and √º on the right side)

ideally, it would be the same pop-ups that "german broad +" - layout uses... while still keeping the special letters on the right the same.

(this might be the same thought this feature-request (https://github.com/anysoftkeyboard/languagepack/issues/285) was going for.

Index: 17
roof/building material/ colour
### general
https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/key:building: colour
https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/key:roof: colour
https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/key:building:material
https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/key:roof:material

### checklist
checklist for quest suggestions (see guidelines):
- [x] üöß to be added tag is established and has a useful purpose. this will add depth and colour to the 3d representation of maps (https://demo.f4map.com/#lat=53.0756263&lon=8.8029777&zoom=17&camera.theta=59.324&camera.phi=-28.648)
- [x] ü§î any answer the user can give must have an equivalent tagging (quest should not reappear to other users when solved by one)
- [x] üêøÔ∏è easily answerable by everyone from the outside but a survey is necessary
- [x] üí§ not an overwhelming percentage of elements have the same answer (no spam)
- [x] üïì applies to a reasonable number of elements (worth the effort)

### ideas for implementation
either a swatch for the colours or a colour average from a photo which gets added as a hex value. the roof material and building material are all already in the wiki.

Index: 19
edit profile section does not close after updating image
**describe the bug**
currently, after updating the image and leaving the first name and last name blank, edit profile section doesn't close. if back button is pressed, a dialog box pops up asking for saving the details even if the details have already been saved. on clicking 'save' in the dialog box, it closes, and user remains on the edit profile section again. only way to leave the section is to press the 'discard' button in the dialog.

**steps to reproduce**
1. ensure that first name and last name are empty.
2. select a profile picture .
3. save the details.

**expected behavior**
edit profile section should close after image is saved.

**would you like to work on the issue?**
open to all.

Index: 20
account list global view?
hello! long time user and fan of k9. thanks for working so hard on this important project! i am running into an issue and i'm not sure if it's user error or if you've decided to simply scratch this.

i can't find a global "bird's eye view" of the accounts list. is there a menu option missing for it?
this view is crucial to quickly glance over 10+ email accounts that i manage and see how many have unread messages, starred, and so on. it's cumbersome to have to go through them one at a time in the sidebar material ux . it's so handy to have this global view and the ability to drill down quickly to folders as needed.

sorry if this is a stupid question. if for some reason you've intentionally removed this global account list view, i guess is there any way to request that you consider please putting it back in? it's essential imo.

happy holidays!

2. type some search terms
3. wait a moment, and the crash appears

Index: 22
enemies get stuck on walls.
before i say anything else, let me just tell you this game is great. (i can't really count the amount of hours today i've spent playing it. :p)
but anyways, during those many hours i've encountered this bug where enemies occasionally get stuck in/on the walls, which is nice, as it pretty much gives you infinite time to prepare, but also slightly frustrating when you have to travel all the way to the beginning of the maze map in order to kill the ones that got stuck in order for the next round to start.

you can see them stuck in the image below:
![screenshot of bug](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/21224688/25879686/9fafdb14-34f8-11e7-8428-a41714865499.png)

Index: 27
"ask" results in infinite loop
when using the ask facility at https://www.grc.com/sqrl/ask.htm, the buttons come up over and over again no matter which one is pressed or how often. the diag webpage confirms that the proper button response was received and login was successful, but the app just keeps pulling up the buttons again.

expected behavior: app goes back to home screen .

actual behavior: although the login works with the proper button response, the app keeps showing the buttons over and over again.

steps to reproduce:

1: go to https://www.grc.com/sqrl/ask.htm and fill out the form
2: scan the qr code with the app
3: respond to the ask dialog by tapping one of the buttons

it would be nice to have a clean, text only conversation view with nick header and message below as an option to current "busy" ui and narrow message pane.

Index: 31
problem with activities?
i'm not 100% if it's actually activities problem, just remember i was fixing something similar in my app loooong time ago.

- yalp store has multiple instances in recents screen
- if you tap on the app to open it's page or use share from browser to open it in yalp store it usually opens page of some other apps you opened previously, so you have to go back multiple times through them to actually open the one you want. same behaviour happens when you search for the app: it frequently displays some old search results. there are other manifestations of the problem, i don't remember all of them.

you mentioned in some issue that you use old device. maybe it just kills the app in background too soon, so the issue was left unnoticed.

my device has android 8.1 miui
Index: 32
[bug] the widget on the lock screen doesn't work after idle
i always have the voice widget on my lock screen . but it can't use it to play my audio if voice have been idle for some time. this bug doesn't happen with the widget on the home screen (where all the app shortcuts are).
if the lock screen widget doesn't work, i have to "enter" my phone, press play on the home screen widget and then i can use the lock screen widget. (sometimes, but not always, i can also fix this bug by starting voice from my bluetooth headset).

Index: 33

Index: 34
slow decryption
passwordstore takes 7 seconds to find the right key, then takes another 7 seconds to decrypt the password after having unlocked the key. i use a 2048-bit rsa key. i have no such performance problems on my pcs.

if there is no way to improve the performance of this, it'd be nice if the ui provided immediate feedback about that process instead of being blank.

Index: 41
improve previous/next buttons on now playing screen




#### describe the feature you want
when playing a video full screen , there are 3 main controls - previous, play/pause and next. these are mostly redundant unless you're watching multiple videos in a playlist. in fact, the next button is available but does nothing when watching a single video, and the previous button goes to the start of the video (and is very easy to accidentally hit).

![ image ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38451588/87004225-6fd15600-c200-11ea-85ec-5bf8aaa1b768.png)

spotify and some other audiobook/podcast apps have a nicer -15sec/+15sec control instead which is great for long durations.

![ image ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38451588/87004980-a52a7380-c201-11ea-88f8-3d842736af37.png)

another option could be to make the buttons fast forward/rewind when holding them down.



#### is your feature request related to a problem? please describe it




#### additional context




#### how will you/everyone benefit from this feature?



less accidentally starting my video over, way easier way to rewind a video by a small amount instead of having to drag the "scrubber" inaccurately. better use of screen real estate, more useful functions!


Index: 42
app does not work after upgrading to 2.9alpha44
###### reproduction steps

1. update app to 2.9alpha44
2. launch app

###### expected result
show the deck collection


###### actual result
after the splash screen , it only shows a blank screen .

on the mail group, mike wrote:
> i wouldn't recommend this for others, but renato if you are comfortable
> playing with alphas, you may be fine - you can alter the app preferences
> to make it think you've already done the upgrade and skip the integrity
> check - it's this key in
> /data/data/com.ichi2.anki/anki_preferences/com.ichi2.anki.shared_prefs.xml
>
> 2.8.5beta1
>
> if the key is 2.9.0alpha44 or higher i suppose it will think you already
> upgraded.
>
> what would be more useful is logcat output during the upgrade though, or
> (since your collection isn't too big...) if you could open an issue and
> attach your collection to it on github? then we could figure out why the
> integrity check isn't working - that would be a help

as he suggested i generated the following logs (please let me know it they are not good, and i will try to create them again):
1. [update.log](https://github.com/ankidroid/anki-android/files/2474795/update.log): the upgrade from alpha4 to alpha44
2. [firstrunalpha44.log](https://github.com/ankidroid/anki-android/files/2474792/firstrunalpha44.log): first run after upgrading.
3. [pref_lastversion2.9alpha44.log](https://github.com/ankidroid/anki-android/files/2474794/pref_lastversion2.9alpha44.log): i also tried to modify the preference file to ignore the check process. the original string was `2.9alpha4` and i only modified to `2.9alpha44`.
4. [pref_lastversion2.9.0alpha44.log](https://github.com/ankidroid/anki-android/files/2474793/pref_lastversion2.9.0alpha44.log): this time i modified the string to match his suggestion `2.9.0alpha44`

i've previously said the my collection was around 10 mb based on ankidesktop upload data, but it is actually around 25 mb.
should i upload it anyway?

i also tried to check the database using the desktop version and fully upload/download on the cellphone.
finally, i've removed my collection on the alpha4 version, and then upgraded it.
however, it showed the same problem for both cases.

###### debug info
refer to the [support page](https://ankidroid.org/docs/help.html) if you are unsure where to get the "debug info".

###### research
*enter an [ x ] character to confirm the points below:*

Index: 45
request for portrait mode
```
dialogs and vnc-connection is permanently in landscape mode

some handsets don't have hardware keyboard, and soft-keyboard in landscape mode
is
uncomfortable

holding phone in portrait mode is much more comfortable, especially for
keyboard input.

could we have a portrait mode please?

i suggest: default to portrait in initial 'new connection' screen , then default
to landscape in vnc
mode, unless settings say otherwise.
```

original issue reported on code.google.com by `robo...@gmail.com` on 16 jan 2010 at 1:17

```
a long time every day reviewing. anki's preset amount of cards that i get is too little
for me. i get a congratulations screen that says there is a way to increase the study
amount. the above procedure was my attempt to resolve this, but it doesn't seem to
have worked.

does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?

every time.

what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look
at the title) cannot find "decks list" to be able to answer this.
on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version) cannot find "menu" from homescreen so cannot answer this.


if it is a crash or "force close" and you can reproduce it, the following
would help immensely: 1) install the "sendlog" app, 2) reproduce the crash,
3) immediately after, launch sendlog, 4) attach the resulting file to this
report. that will make the bug much easier to fix.


please provide any additional information below.

only would comment that setting the daily card limit should be a very easy thing to
do for flashcard programs, and not require technical support, so i hope that this can
be improved in previous versions. i have seen many comments on the internet saying
this is a known issue with anki not having this most basic flashcard feature working
very well.
```

Index: 62
so many problems since andriod 8 update on nexus 5x
i have the nexus 5x running android 8.0 and antennapod 1.6.4.1 . did a factory reset and only have a couple other non factory apps installed. first let me say i tried all the podcast players out there and this was by far the best. i really loved this program until recent and wish i hadn't updated to android 8. today it just got so bad i couldn't take it anymore thats why i'm opening a bug report. so many problems i don't know where to start.

1 randomly just starts playing when plugging into the charger
randomly starts playing if i let call go unanswered while plugged in to charger
randomly starts playing after using the camera and then turning screen off and putting in pocket.

2 sometimes starts up playing multiple pod casts at the same time including the last podcast i listened
to thats marked as played and shows download only. update - today when it began to play on its own
i discovered that it was playing the same episode over top of itself. the episode began simultaneously
playing from where i left off and also from the very beginning. how can that even happen?

3 today it just started playing when i turned the display off and i couldn't shut it off. none of the
playback control buttons would respond and it continued to play even after i closed all programs. i had
to open up android settings, all apps, and manually stop antenna pod to get it to shut down.

4 sometimes when restarting an paused episode the playback will start completely over at the very
beginning instead of where i left off.

5 this problem has me even more confused because i'm not sure whats to blame. the same podcasts i
been getting from itunes using the same unchanged home network take much longer to download. a
podcast that use to take 2 min now takes 30 minutes. very frustrating.





Index: 63
the zoom of the camera does not work correctly.

#### expected behavior
the zoom of the main camera is expected to return to normal after the application is closed. and when you open it again, the zoom is automatically removed.


#### actual behavior
the zoom of the main camera has an error, when you approach it completely with the flash on and exit the application if it returned to its original state, it throws an error when you start again. the application takes the previous zoom as the main image , does not allow to reduce the zoom, just continue increasing.
#### how to reproduce
- download the application.
- install.
- start and turn on the permanent flash.
- zoom in completely and close the application.
- when you start again, the application takes the image upgraded previously as the main image .
- it does not allow the zoom to go back, it only allows to close it even more, distorting the image .
- you can only retake the original image by changing the resolution .
* browser: simple camera v3.1.4
* operating system: android 5.1.1

#### recording of the bug
https://youtu.be/fi5gamelsfm



posted on utopian.io - rewarding open source contributors

Index: 64
notification settings: consider adding a setting for login push notifications
we received some feedback asking for a notification setting for login push notifications:

> i have disabled notifications on my wordpress android app for work/life balance reasons. unfortunately there is no notification type ‚Äúauth‚Äù in the android app which could have me had continued to use the feature but i‚Äôm not sure it‚Äôs worth the effort.

(internal reference: p4a5px-2z2-p2#comment-10903 cc @akirk)

currently, we have notification settings for app notifications for sites you own, sites you follow, and for comment replies and likes but we do not have a separate setting for login push notification.

notification settings|your sites|followed sites|comments on other sites
---|---|---|---

Index: 70
implement zoom level dependent stroke appearance for new map api

Index: 71
trash not sync'ing correctly
the behavior changed after last release.

### expected behavior
when a message is moved to the trash, it is moved to the trash locally and on the server. if a sync is issued on that folder, then the local trash will reflect the changes of the server, including any recently moved messages.

### actual behavior
the messages are being moved to the trash, but when it is synchronized with the server, it is duplicating the messages locally. then when the delete is issued from the server side and a subsequent sync happens on the trash folder, the remote duplicates are removed, but the local duplicates remain. the server has no reference to the messages in the trash, and as far as it knows, it is empty. however, k9 believes there are messages in the trash folder. repeated sync's do not remove them. clearing messages locally will remove the duplicate messages.

### steps to reproduce
1. delete message
2. sync trash folder
3. observe duplicate messages
4. empty trash via server (aka, another interface )
5. sync trash folder
6. observer locally moves messages still appearing in trash
7. clear local messages from trash folder
8. messages are gone

### environment
k-9 mail version:
5.600

android version:
8.1.0

account type (imap, pop3, webdav/exchange):
imap

Index: 72
allow managing multiple share links per folder
### is your feature request related to a problem? please describe.
i wanted to share a folder with two sets of people:
- some people who should be able to have write access (so they dont need to have an account)
- some people who have read only access to the folder

therefore i wanted to create two dedicated links (as i did on another folder in the past via web ui ) and realized that it is not possible here. when creating a second link on web i additionally only see one link in nextcloud android.

### describe the solution you'd like
manage multiple links per folder as nextcloud web provides.

### additional context
it might be related to #3679 as it deals with multiple "share targets". but as it only relates to other accounts (!= "anonymous links") i think this is something different.

Index: 74
kore favorites local error with "unsupported type"


## bug report
### describe the bug
here is a clear and concise description of what the problem is:




a kore error message is generated when a favourite with type "unknown" (as displayed in the kore favourites tab).




## expected behavior
here is a clear and concise description of what was expected to happen:


browsing the favourites tab, selecting the favourite should start the chosen item whether it's an addon or tv channel etc.

the "abc news" has "type":"media", and when selected, starts the addon. the others have "type":"unknown", and errors on the kore app and wont start.

## actual behavior


i have ‚Äúfavourite‚Äùd a few add-ons, but most appear to have an ‚Äúunknown‚Äù type. when i select one with a type "unknown", the app errors with message ‚Äúunable to play favourite item. unsupported type‚Äù.


## possible fix


make it mandatory for addon developers to include "type".

while the effect is seen in the kore remote/favourites, the cause is probably somewhere deep in the bowels of kodi. having chatted with the foxtel addon developer (one of the apps that wont start), he is unaware of where the "type" is set.

### to reproduce
steps to reproduce the behavior:



1. from within kodi, select addons
2. from addon categories, select "my addons"
3. select an addon (eg; youtube)
4. in context menu, select "add to favourites"
5. return to main kodi menu
6. select favourites from left menu and confirm presence of addon.
7. open kore app on mobile.
8. select favourites from menu
9. confirm presence of newly added favourite.
10. "unknown" is printed directly under the favourite label.
11. selecting this favourite, generates the error message.


### debuglog


the debuglog can be found here:

when i query kodi using the jsonrpc, the ‚Äúunknown‚Äù type is coming from kodi somewhere:

http://10.0.0.109:8080/jsonrpc?request={"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"favourites.getfavourites","id":16,"params":{"properties":["window","windowparameter","thumbnail","path"]}}

{"id":16,"jsonrpc":"2.0","result":{"favourites":[{"path":"pvr://channels/tv/all channels/pvr.hts_389916625.pvr","thumbnail":"http://i.mjh.nz/au/images/tv.101002210220.png","title":"abc news","type":"media"},{"thumbnail":"/storage/.kodi/addons/plugin.video.netflix/resources/media/ icon .png","title":"netflix","type":"unknown"},{"thumbnail":"/storage/.kodi/addons/plugin.video.foxtel.go/ icon .png","title":"foxtel go","type":"unknown"},{"thumbnail":"/storage/.kodi/addons/plugin.video.youtube/ icon .png","title":"youtube","type":"unknown"}],"limits":{"end":4,"start":0,"total":4}}}



### screenshots
here are some links or screenshots to help explain the problem:

![20191228_114820](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32290447/71536909-fdd2a700-2968-11ea-87cb-aecc60435c99.jpg)



## additional context or screenshots (if appropriate)
here is some additional context or explanation that might help:


imho, it's important to fix in order to improve the intuitive nature of the app, making kodi more enjoyable for the less geeky in my household.


### your environment
used operating system:



- mobile device: samsung a5 (2017)
- android version: 8.0.0
- kodi version and platform: kodi 18.2/ libreelec 9.02
- kore version: 2.4.7





*note: once the issue is made we require you to update it with new information or kodi versions should that be required.
team kodi will consider your problem report however, we will not make any promises the problem will be solved.*

dear developer.

i got the upgrade to v3.18 yesterday and now i can not change the layout , because the globe icon that used to be on the left side of the spacebar is gone, as seen below.

![screenshot_20200206-060207](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5880037/73907649-d6e48a80-48af-11ea-95c7-576c3d172c68.png)

so now i am stuck with the greek keyboard layout and the only way i see to change it is to go to long press comma > press the gear icon > go to languages > disable "use system languages" and enable english. and the other way round for switching back to greek.
disabling "use system languages" and selecting 2 or more languages, us english and greek for instance, makes the globe icon appear again and work like it used to, so i can use this for now.

nokia 5, android 9, simple keyboard 3.18 and the option "hide language switch key" set to disabled.

previous versions of kore showed the channel icon that has been configured in kodi.

the first letter of the channel name is shown like when no icon is configured in kodi.


## possible fix


sync channel icons from kodi.

1. configure pvr channel icons in, so that they are shown in the list of the "tv" section in kodi.
2. go to "pvr" section in kore

there is no debug output.

steps to reproduce:

1. go to settings > accessibility > talkback > "use service" or use the [volume key shortcut](https://support.google.com/accessibility/android/answer/6006966?hl=en).
1. in the wordpress app, go to my site > activity.
1. swipe right to read through several items in the log.

**result:** the activity icon is read aloud as "activity log" for each item which is repetitive and doesn't add value. ideally, the type of item would be read first then the title and the icon would not be read aloud at all. ([1m13s](https://cloudup.com/c-k99sg3b_i))

icon -wpandroid-13 8-rc-1">
tested with wpandroid 13.8-rc-1 on pixel 3 android 10.

Index: 85
[feature request] decouple language from keyboard layout
i just installed anysoftkeyboard and like very much. thank you for a very good alternative to proprietary keyboards :)

i'm a bit confused, though, by the fact that the keyboard layout is coupled with the spellchecker language. i'm used to the french azerty keyboard, regardless of the language in which i write (french or english), so i would like to be able to use an english spellchecker with the azerty keyboard as well...

i know i could fix this by proposing a new "english keyboard" with an azerty layout , but it would seem cleaner to have the keep the two settings independent (even if each layout could have a *default* dictionary associated to it).

Index: 94
editor: editor scrolls to bottom after inserting media
edit a post. make sure it has enough content to scroll.
insert the cursor near the top of the screen .
tap the photo option on the format bar to insert an image at the cursor position.
i chose to insert an image from the gallery.
pick an image to return to the editor.
notice that the textfield has scrolled to the bottom of the screen , but the image has been inserted in the correct location.
we want to avoid scrolling away from where the image was inserted.

Index: 97
intent protocole to delegate input to third-party apps
### intent protocole to delegate input to third-party apps

the goal of the intent protocole is to provide an api for integrating third-party apps ime in ask.

this protocole will allow the community to create applications with some special ime reading capabilities (e.g. barcode scanning, nfc reader, gif, image input ...etc) and return the data to ask to set the input.

Index: 105
search results: allow actions on multiple items
a useful feature of the old stock android music player was to automatically treat search results as a "temporary playlist": i.e. clicking on the first item would play it, then play the next item etc.

in vinyl, this is not supported; results from a search can only be acted upon individually: you can only play one track at a time by clicking on it (but without the standard "now playing" screen , so no cover display, no controls, why?); or you can enqueue / add to playlist only one item at a time (using the 3 dots menu on the right of each item).

one should be able to apply actions (play, enqueue, add to playlist) to multiple items in the search results list: either all items, or a selection of them.

i.e.: the "search results" view should behave like the songs tab, only listing the search results, instead of all tracks.
Index: 106
using svg for text
assalamualaikum

instead of using images for the quranic text, has [svg](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/scalable_vector_graphics) been considered as an option?
i believe that we can convert the quran images to svg paths and use them to display instead of images. this way we'll have extremely light-weight and very high resolution (infinitely scalable) text for the quran.

there's a library available for android svg : https://github.com/bigbadaboom/androidsvg

i have experience in dealing with svgs and also casual android development, please let me know if i can help with this.

wassalaam,
omair ahmed

at org.ligi.passandroid. ui .quirk_fix.usairwaysloadactivity.oncreate(sourcefile:15)

because all these activities are exported ones, i.e., be exposed to outside, they may receive unfriendly commands and then lead to app crash. after investigation, we found that the missing of null checkers causes those crashes.
please help to confirm whether they are true bugs. we believe that fixing these bugs will further improve the robustness of this app.

Index: 108
snackbar appears over bottom toolbar
## bug report

### are you ready to report?
- your issue may already be reported! please search on the [issue track](../) before creating one.
- ensure you have tested with the last (dev) version of the software. (if not, and if possible, run your test again with the most recent version available.)

### environment
* version of the software you use : android studio 3.0.1
* device / operating system : nexus 5x / android 8.1.0

### the bug:

* what do you obtain? a copy of the error message or a screenshot is always useful.

the snackbar appear over bottom navigation bar when we bookmark / remove bookmark any item.






* when does this occur?

#### steps to reproduce:

1. go to setting and enable bottom toolbar.
2. now an the main page try bookmarking any article
3. try removing the bookmark also.
...

* what should be the behaviour from your point of view? how do you expect the service to work?
as per the [material ui guidelines](https://material.io/guidelines/components/bottom- navigation .html#bottom- navigation -specs) the snackbar should appear above the bottom navigation bar as shown in the screenshot below.


### other comments:
would like to work on it.

Index: 109
crash - adding categories to post in post settings
to reproduce:
- create new post
- go to post settings
- add more than one category
- press back

Index: 113
switching wifi only preference does not affect already queued jobs
### actual behaviour
the preference of whether uploading should be done over only wifi or allow mobile data is stored into every queued job, instead of getting polled from the folder preferences. if a job is already queued, it will get queued using the initial settings that were set during its creation. any changes to the settings after that are ignored.

### expected behaviour
-a job belonging to the autoupload of a certain folder should poll the current settings of that folder to know how to proceed, not insist on using the settings that existed during the job creation.

### steps to reproduce
-have the camera folder set to autoupload using wifi only.
-turn off wifi
-take a bunch of photos.
-you notice they are in the queue, but waiting for wifi to upload
-go to camera autoupload preferences, switch off the "wifi only" option, to allow mobile data uploads.
-the queued jobs would still wait for wifi.
-taking a new photo will instantly upload over mobile data. but already queued ones will wait indefinetly till wifi is turned on.

workaround: move the files to a temp folder. force rescan, all jobs will fail as files are now missing. copy the files to their original folder (moving for some reason didn't work, does the app keep inodes or something?), the app will now recreate the upload jobs using new settings. once upload completes, delete temp folder.


### environment data
android version: 7

device model: samsung note 8

stock or customized system: stock, december security update.

nextcloud app version: 2.0.0

nextcloud server version: 12.0.4



Index: 114

**current behaviour**: invisible if theme is light or system.

Index: 120
[feature request] multiple windows to allow opening/pausing multiple videos (like browser tabs)
- [x] i checked if the issue/feature exists in the latest version.

markor is a foss text editor that opens text files in new windows. every text file opened gets its own window (i think google calls it a 'foreground activity'?). this means you can switch between them using the recents key. for reference, please look at this screenshot of markor:

![img_eggsif_4469219656284121490](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53176348/64918818-04128e00-d793-11e9-94e0-412eee72e4f4.png)

currently, browsing and watching videos is a linear experience. you watch a video, then go back, browse to another video you're interested in, watch that, go back, and so on. i think it would vastly improve ux if videos were opened in their own window. this would allow the user to pause the video and continue browsing newpipe. it could also allow opening multiple videos, pausing them whenever you switch away from their window. this can bring newpipe on par with tabbed video browsing in a web browser. (i'm aware that a savvy user can use smart queue management to watch multiple videos, but this way would be far more flexible.)

right now, we can do this in a very limited way for two videos, by opening one as a popup. (it does behave correctly, though. playing one automatically pauses the other. popup is a very refined feature. good job on that!)

one place where i can especially see this helping is when you have a video paused in newpipe, and while using a browser you come across a linked video you want to watch in the app. as of now, you can either open it and lose the paused video, or you can wait till you're finished watching the paused one.

p.s.: the audio version of this could be: open a new audio stream, pause the currently playing one, and append another notification below the current one. playing any one pauses the others.

is this something we would want to change?

![screenshot_2019-02-10-20-47-04-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1119271/52733697-94c88780-2f80-11e9-9bfe-b4566e1d564a.jpeg)

```
java.lang.illegalstateexception: the content of the adapter has changed but listview did not receive a notification. make sure the content of your adapter is not modified from a background thread, but only from the ui thread. make sure your adapter calls notifydatasetchanged() when its content changes. Index: 136
```
[site creation] infinite progress indicator
newsitecreationservice can enter an invalid state when it can't be started, but the ui is showing a progress indicator - since the back button is suppressed the only way out is to kill the app.

### steps to reproduce the behavior
1. start the new site creation flow
2. select a segment
3. skip
4. skip
5. type any domain
6. turn on the flight mode
7. select a domain
8. create site
9. turn off the airplane mode
10. retry
-> notice the progress indicator is infinite

cc @sylvesterwilmott this is the type of bug i was afraid of. since the user can't exit the flow with the back button, the only way out is to kill the app. showing a warning dialog when the user presses the back button would be safer. don't you want to reconsider?

```
device (phone) brand: samsung
device (phone) model: droid nexus
android os version: 4.0

when i say it crashes, i mean it puts a message box to the screen that says
"unfortunately, a2dp volume has stopped", and there is an ok button underneath
the message. i don't get a force close error. about 5 seconds after i touch
ok, i get a message that fades onto the screen saying "a2dp volume service
started". so it appears that the service gets stopped and then automatically
starts again. upon starting the second time, it doesn't crash again, but it
doesn't connect to my a2dp device either. the way for me to get it to crash is
to turn off my car so that all bluetooth devices power down and disconnect, and
then power on the car again. it's on the initial power on that i get the error.

```

download should occur and sound notification in locked screen when email arrives. visual notification afterwards (perhaps blinking to save power). perhaps display a dot (.gif) on screen for incoming mail. other dots in different screen location for other notifications.

tell us what happens instead

Index: 155
add a default size class when adding an image
ios mimics calypso and wp-admin and adds the default size class `size-full` when the user inserts an image in the editor. the size class can be changed afterward via the edit image feature.

this is required because the size class satisfies the selection logic for choosing a photo to show in the post list cards.

Index: 159

when enabling/disabling the dark theme, there's an animation that makes the process feel much smoother than most apps. i'd like to see if i can put together some prs to add that animation to some other apps i use. relevant code (from settingsactivity.java):

```
private void restartactivity() {
taskstackbuilder.create(getapplicationcontext()).addnextintentwithparentstack(getintent()).startactivities();
}
```

does taskstackbuilder create the animation, too? i'm relatively new to android dev and just want to make sure i'm not missing anything.

thank you!

Index: 160

use 24-hour clock.
don't need am or pm.
ex: march 08, 2019 19:23:56
chinese date format:
2019Âπ¥3Êúà8Êó• 19:23:56
("yyyyÂπ¥mmÊúàddÊó• hh:mm:ss")
screenshot:

![ image ](https://i.imgur.com/iblvvml.png)



https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/sss28s_3.0.0/com.ibm.help.forms.doc/locale_spec/i_xfdl_r_formats_zh_hant_tw.html

Index: 168
differences in languages
1. on english the top row has every graphic accent and numbers, in spanish it only has one type of accents and no numbers.

2. almost every letter on the english one has diverse functions on hold, on spanish only vowels.

3. changing between languages is a chore, the spacebar is too small and the keyboard layout changes with language.

nonetheless the keyboard is great and i will continue to use it, but as trilingual person it has some inconveniences

```
what's your job?

what's your job?

happen only one time?

it happens always


what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look
at the title) ankidroid v2.0.4
on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version) 4.1.2


if it is a crash or "force close" and you can reproduce it, the following
would help immensely: 1) install the "sendlog" app, 2) reproduce the crash,
3) immediately after, launch sendlog, 4) attach the resulting file to this
report. that will make the bug much easier to fix.


please provide any additional information below.

i attach as cards are configured

```

Index: 175
cannot close player in notification drawer when stopped
how to reproduce:
1. start station.
2. stop station in notification drawer (or lock screen ).
3. click on x in notification drawer to close app.

app is not closing after pressing the x, but when station not stopped (i.e. playing) then x works as expected an app is closing.

os: android 4.4.4
(i check old issues, but this here seems like a bug because the x works when a station is playing. so it's not the same as in https://github.com/y20k/transistor/issues/159.)

Index: 178
immersive mode hides new/learning/due counts and timer
the new immersive mode/true full screen hides the bar that displays whether the card is new, learning, or due, and hides the remaining number of cards in each of those categories. it also hides the timer.

ankimobile for ios deals with this by putting the new/learning/due counts in the show answer part of the screen . if ankidroid could display the information there, along with the timer, it would improve immersive mode.

otherwise, would it be possible to have two options for full screen ? one that preserves the old full screen behavior, by displaying only the upper menu bar, and one that has the new immersive behavior?

since i really want to see my timer and card counts, i'm turning off the fullscreen setting, which is a step backwards for me.

Index: 183
feature request: mail folder widget
it would be terrific if k9-mail would incorporate an folder view widget, similar to the one the gmail (and other e-mail apps) have. i came across maillistwidget for k9 (http://maillistwidgetk9.lombardi.mobi/ since the google play page no longer seems to work) but it no longer seems to work. email widget (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.foobarsoft.emailwidget) is also supposed to work, but is apparently limited to the unified mailbox and doesn't provide important information like whether the message is read or unread.

here's an example from gmail (the widget is in the middle of the screenshot on the right side):
![ image ](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3299186/18255812/5c9b2dae-737b-11e6-8fc9-92c2331f540d.png)

thank you for a terrific app, and your consideration.

Index: 185
instead of crashing, or showing an error, can newpipe just... not scroll?

### version

- 0.19.1

### steps to reproduce the bug

1. search something.
2. turn off internet.
3. scroll down the list.

### expected behavior
since newpipe can't load new items in the list without internet, it should just not scroll after the last already loaded one. you could mention the network error and show the retry button in the space _below_ the last list item.

### actual behaviour
screen clears and shows network error with a retry button.

in rare cases like i just got, crash. ui error. it seems to involve the androidx recyclerview.

interestingly, with this error page, tapping back takes you to the home screen , but you can open newpipe from its launcher and use it without any error. if you tap back from there, though, you're taken to the error page again. it's in the backstack or something.

if you turn internet back on and then open newpipe, it removes the error page from the backstack.

### logs
## exception
* __user action:__ ui error
* __request:__ app crash, ui failure
* __content language:__ en_in
* __service:__ none
* __version:__ 0.19.1
* __os:__ linux android 9 - 28


crash log




Index: 193
if launcher, desktop wallpaper offset at startup
i have android 7.1.2 on several tx92 tv pcs. if taskbar is the default launcher and loaded at startup, wallpaper will occupy the right two-thirds of the screen , only. if nova launcher is opened, then closed, wallpaper will properly align with the entire screen .

when using nova launcher as the default launcher and loaded at startup, wallpaper corrects as soon as nova launcher loads.

this may indicate maintenance needed by taskbar when it loads as default launcher. other launchers were tried and they also correct the wallpaper position.

android.clients.google.com
maps.google.com

investigation into application freezing os
originally reported on google code with id 2074

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. install application on galaxy note 3
2. open application
3. wait a couple of hours then entire os starts to lag, with cpu maxed out

tested with on/off days for around 15 days. issue occurs on the 7 days that ankidroid
was installed, and issues not seen whilst uninstalled on the remaining 8 days.

does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?
this is repeatable, however, it seems to take some time for the cpu usage to kick in.
and since the offending issue is running within the system ui process, its hard to
say its definitely caused by anki, other then the correlation strongly suggesting it.


this is android kitkat, on galaxy note 3.


whilst i'm not looking for a solution here, or for anyone to start looking into, mostly
wondering if anyone else has seen the issue or knows anything.

since im an android developer, i'd quite like to get to the bottom of this myself,
and will keep updates and findings here
```

```
would help immensely: 1) install the "sendlog" app, 2) reproduce the crash,
3) immediately after, launch sendlog, 4) attach the resulting file to this
report. that will make the bug much easier to fix.
```

reported by `evilisforever` on 2013-01-18 09:14:51

Index: 200
material design update 2018
# redesign progress
_(updated on january 3, 2019)_

the goal with [this fork's branch](https://github.com/nickdvlpr/anki-android/tree/material- design -2018) is to redesign ankidroid by following the latest material design guidelines released by google. this redesign was initially created for my own personal use, but i thought i'd share it in case anyone was interested. this project started here: #4998.

![material_design_update_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6563631/50653992-fabcfa80-0f50-11e9-98c6-c1217ed79b3e.png)
**(above)** the flashcard reviewer page has moved all controls to the bottom. in addition, the "show answer" button animates on and off the screen . buttons have also been changed to have less color in order to focus the user on the flashcards. the account pages have been updated to include more material components, including text input fields and buttons.

![screens_2_small](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6563631/50661358-82623380-0f68-11e9-9001-7956197eb1e1.png)
**(above)** before and after for the reviewer page.




# implementation
i've tried my best to maintain the overall architecture of the app, although changing the ui required heavily editing the current theme system, so there could be a few hiccups if we decide to commit these changes in the future.

there are some smaller changes we could add in incremental updates, including updated iconography, the new white theme, animations, and individual screens.




[x] i have read the [support page](https://ankidroid.org/docs/help.html) and am reporting a bug or enhancement request specific to ankidroid
[x] i have checked the [manual](https://ankidroid.org/docs/manual.html) and the [faq](https://github.com/ankidroid/anki-android/wiki/faq) and could not find a solution to my issue
[x] i have searched for similar existing issues here and on the user forum

Index: 204
bulk import playlists from youtube account
hi there i do like newpipe. however there is also the issue of importing playlists from youtube account into newpipe.
the idea being is that like firetube app. you can add your username and a list of playlists come up, which you can then select to import into the app. so why not add something like that?
also what about importing saved playlists that other youtubers have done? maybe some way like i have said before?
finally there needs to be a way of keeping them updated so if i add a new video from the desktop then the playlist is updated upon opening the app. then visa versa if i add a new video to a playlist in new pipe i should be able to see that video on youtube.
maybe that last one is a stretch because you may need the ability for the app to access your google account which i don't mind doing.
after-all if newpipe is limiting and doesn't have many import features then the masses and average joe wont bother to use it because they would say its too limiting.
i hoping to start learning app design soon in unity/c and love to know how i could contribute in any way. however i better at gui design so im happy to help in that way.

- [x] i carefully read the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/teamnewpipe/newpipe/blob/head/.github/contributing.md) and agree to them.
- [x] i checked if the issue/feature exists in the latest version.

Index: 205
download service issue
## bug report

### environment
* version of the software you use : 2.2
* device / operating system : 6.0.1 onplus x

### the bug:

* content download does not start/or happens at a very slow speed if you switch apps just after starting the download. this was tested for different types of content and multiple times. the speed of download is significantly slower if the app gets minimized and the download needs to be canceled and restarted again for faster download.

* content stays in the downloading tab with 100% progress even after completion of the download. i haven't been able to reliably reproduce this issue though.

* this occurs if you don't wait for the progress bar on the download to move (which is around 8-12 seconds but can vary) after putting your content for downloading before switching apps or minimizing it.

*the first and second picture shows that the wikipedia math has been fully downloaded and yet still stays in the downloading tab.
![ pic 1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12858001/37804943-0f23b41c-2e5d-11e8-90ea-ac10d55040cf.jpeg)
![ pic 2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12858001/37804945-124f0c90-2e5d-11e8-82ce-46e118f7f409.jpeg)

*these show the main issue of content not downloading if the app is swapped just after download starts. the download size of both was comparable, yet the one started afterwards downloaded first.

![p3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12858001/37834445-bc685314-2ed3-11e8-9ab5-98114757e3ed.jpeg)
![p4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12858001/37834446-bcb29d2a-2ed3-11e8-8c65-1bc1f23b45ac.jpeg)
![p5](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12858001/37834447-bcf671f8-2ed3-11e8-8a5a-131aa728e096.jpeg)

#### steps to reproduce:

1. put a content (which you haven't downloaded before) on download
2. within seconds press the home button on your mobile to exit the app.
3. the download will stall or will appear to happen at a very slow speed.
4. only canceling and redownloading will fix this, pausing and restarting does not work.

*optimal behavior:
the service should be able to handle the download in the background once it has started.

video playing in pop-up mode is not paused when display go to sleep
- [x] i carefully read the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/teamnewpipe/newpipe/blob/head/.github/contributing.md) and agree to them.
- [x] i checked if the issue/feature exists in the latest version.
- [ ] i did use the [incredible bugreport to markdown converter](https://teamnewpipe.github.io/crashreporttomarkdown/) to paste bug reports.
# context
- device: nexus 5x
- os version: android 8.0.0
- app version: newest dev branch (13/12/2018)

# describe the bug
if the video is playing in full- screen mode, when i lock the phone (shut up the display), the video will be paused. but if the video is playing in pop-up mode, lock the phone won't pause the video.

# how to reproduce
play a video in pop-up mode and lock the screen .

# expected behavior
the video should be paused, like full- screen mode.

Index: 207
[feature request] layout designer or i'll do it myself
hi,

not a bug. i hate the default android layout , i consider it one of the biggest failure in the ux universally. i am bewildered by the fact that google didn't think about giving us the chance to change the layout , nor i can find a keyboard that let me do so. there are a couple on the store, to be honest, but they are inferior. i finally found out this anysoftkeyboard that while doesn't have the feature, is an open-source project, so potentially i could do it myself, while still having a fully-featured keyboard. if you are not planning to add the feature to change the layout (i understand is quite a bit of work), could you point me to which steps i should take to change the layout myself? i am a coder, although i have never worked on android, so you can be technical.
Index: 208
video interface improvement
i have some ideas to improve the video +popup interface
- first, make possible to see the video while reading the description for example, without using the "switch to popup" button (because its not handy) you could make a button which appears when your phone is horizontal to switch quilckly:
http://i65.tinypic.com/21lo9z9.png

- then the popup should be deletable more easily, for instance as the messenger app (an area who deletes the popup):
http://i65.tinypic.com/200com0.png

- finally the ability to resize and replace the popup when you go to another newpipe page (as the subscription page), like the youtube app do :
http://i68.tinypic.com/4u8g01.png

the most important would be that all this functionalities could be enabled or disabled by the user, to make newpipe as customizable as possible :)

### expected behaviour

1. install new version of the app & migrate (settings -> path (unknown) -> select path: (only one option shows up) /storage/emulated/0/android/data/com.nextcloud.client/files)
2. open photo -app or play music-app

Index: 210
widget colors
hi over there,

any chance of changing the colors (resp. increase "readability") in the widgets?

as a slightly "green/red color impaired" guy (as about 30 % of all men are, if you believe in the statistics), it's really hard to distinguish between "gold" (#ffffd000, - for "plan slightly exceeded by e. g. 2% points") and "lime green" (ff00ff00 - for "everything's fine, cause there are 5 % points left").

i would strongly prefer the colors, call meter 3g uses in the program itself (esp. a darker green than "lime"), cause these are way more easy to read - esp. "at a glance".

thx in advance!

cheers, magpie

Index: 224
spam folder with spaces not recognized or opened
i am new to k-9, but install & setup seemed to go ok. almost.

i selected 'train as spam' as my (imap) spam folder. the name has spaces, but not the quotes. the folder exists on the server (and has quite a few messages!) it is accessible from thunderbird imap.

i expect it to enable the spam filing icon , and to be able to open the folder. neither happens.

i have no trouble accessing other folders - including folders with spaces in their names. so it seems to be an issue with the "spam" "special" folder.

if i look at the folder list, i see:
````
sent (sent)
spam
(faint text) command: examine "spam";re
trash
````
if i open the spam folder, it appears to be empty, but says "load up to 25 more".
click on that, and all i get is the same message. no messages are listed.

there is no spam icon or menu item if i open a message. nor a spam option if i long-press a message.

my best guess is that the spaces in the folder name are confusing k-9.

i am running android 9 (on a moto x-4) ppws29.69-26-5, security patch level 1-feb-19
k-9 verson 5.600

i managed to enable debug logging & retrieve a log while trying to view the spam folder: neither "spam" nor "spam" appears in the log. so i don't think it's useful.

unfortunately, i can't change the folder name on the server.

Index: 225
sitecreationstate data payloud out of synch with ui when moving backwards then skipping forwards through site creation wizard
### expected behavior
during new site creation, moving backwards in the wizard should not create a deviation between the "sitecreationstate" used to create your site, and what the ui input forms show to the user.

### actual behavior
if you move backwards in the site creation wizard, you will clear the user input forms for vertical, site title, and tagline. if you skip through them on your next pass through, however, leaving them in this empty form, and then search for a domain and create a site, the vertical, site title, and tagline previously entered will come back because they stayed preserved in the sitecreationstate.

### feeback welcome!, see my suggestion below:
not objectively obvious whether we want these fields to clear when the user moves backwards, but if we do, then we should clear the "sitecreationstate" so users next pass through doesn't save unexpected state, not visible to the user if they skip. in my opinion, we should not clear the ui when the user moves backwards through the wizard, we should just display the previously saved "sitecreationstate" which we are already retaining anyway.

### steps to reproduce the behavior

1. my site
2. switch site
3. click on plus sign icon in the top right corner
4. select "create wordpress.com site"
5. choose a site type
6. enter some custom vertical type, click next
7. enter site title and tagline, click next
8. on the choose a domain screen , hit the back arrow
9. on the title/tagline screen , hit the back arrow
10. on the vertical screen , hit the back arrow
11. choose a site type
12. press skip for site vertical
13. press skip for title/tagline
14. search a domain, select, and press create (before you search you will see the previously entered title even though you skipped title input this time)
15. verify that the previously entered vertical, title, and tagline have returned even though they were skipped on second pass through the wizard.

*note in test build i wasn't able to create a site (oauth settings?), but i was able to verify the issue with play store build, and with test build i was able to verify unexpected "sitecreationstate" using the debugger.

##### tested on [pixel 2 emulator], android [api 27], wpandroid [develop - 057e5c0ffd2db9148b9f554aa4152f76d500f0cb]

Index: 226
suggestion : one tap to any thing.

then, the "..." icon will be "preference icon "(which looks like a wheel or something).

...there's some unhealthy obsession into eliminating a tap there...

Index: 227
project re-organization and "email-chat" naming
i see new deltachat repos and work on a new frontend, bindings etc.
as i and others have reported before, and re-occurring consistently, i see the perception that new users and devs get when they first hear about "deltachat" is mainly "yet another different chat app". the name has nothing that connotes its best and unique features.

it has also become apparent that the solution of the problems that deltachat solved along its journey (backwards compatible and optionally separated autocrypt push email) are really quite universal. something that should not get hidden as if it were part of a brand segregation strategy.

the common notion for properly federated messaging could just be, and i think should become: " just reach me over email-chat". and installing an email-chat application can be seen as a step to ease email handling by quite an order of magnitude, instead of installing yet another messenger.

later, due to the backwards compatibility, the notion could change back again to "just reach me over email", as more and more muas start making use of the -core library and bindings.

the complete and more correct technical term for "deltachatting" might be something like "using the autocrypt and email-chat specs", but that's likely a little too much.

thus, in conjuction with the current re-arrangements and before publishing v1.0, i think it would be good to sincerely consider this, and at least renaming the -core lib, if not better also the front-end application to "email-chat". the work of renaming will certainly be rewarded by a much better perception.

* users won't be surprised when asked for their email-address after installing the "email-chat" app.
* it is much more apparent that "email-chat" users can "reach the world"
* devs and actually any person that will hear about the "email-chat" app, or capability (lib), are immediately pointed much closer to getting the proper picture .
* ...
Index: 228
cannot terminate application
there is no way to simply end k9. this function is needed to:
1. prevent unwanted network use
2. prevent the battery drain when not needed

great, app, but having to use the clunky android settings to terminate the app is a big downer.

Index: 230
improve description in pin lock screen
i recently tapped on the `turn pin lock on` in account settings and i was presented by a screen asking me: enter your pin.

now, what pin would that be? my device pin? i'm sure not, but it might make lots of users sit there and think about it for a sec and still not be sure what this means or does. and what exactly will that lock down after i enter a pin?

i guess we could improve this by adding a bit more detail here. something like "enter a new app pin" (if i do it the first time around) or "enter your current app pin" if i'm going to change it. i'll leave to the more design +english fluent here to come up with the best wording ;)

Index: 241
option to disable auto download on specific podcast
this feature request is somewhat related to #1077 (option to auto download oldest episode first). the use case is this:
- a podcast that is "low-priority" that i do not want to download it until i have time to listen.
- furthermore, the podcast is serial in nature, so it does not make much sense to listen to the latest episode without first catching up on the older ones.

if i can disable auto download on the specific podcast, i can then go to podcast screen and download specific episodes (the oldest unplayed ones) when i have time to listen.

thoughts?

---

how to implement:
- on the podcast screen , add there is an additional menu item for settings (for the podcast)
- a new settings "pop-in" screen can allow the users to disable auto download.

Index: 244
identi.ca signin not working
## expected behavior

it is possible to create an account for identi.ca, at least from posts on the web.

i used the following settings:

accounts -> click "add account" icon -> click outside the "twitter/fanfou/mastodon/statusnet" pop-up -> click the server icon in the top right

api url format: https://identi.ca/api
account type: [tried twitter and statusnet, does it matter what you select here?]
auth type: basic
no version suffix: [tried both]

i then entered my identi.ca username and password (the latter multiple times, including changing it on identi.ca, to be sure), and got an error: "incorrect api settings" if i did not select "no version suffix" and "wrong username/password" if i selected "no version suffix" (if i mistype the api url format in thsi case, i also get "incorrect api settings").

## actual behavior

login to identi.ca succeeds and i see my identi.ca timeline as i do see twitter and mastodon

## steps to reproduce

## extra info

android version: 7.1.2

network type:

- [ ] cellular
- [x] wi-fi

app version: 3.6.21

build variant:

- [x] google
- [ ] f-droid

micro-blogging service:

- [ ] twitter
- [ ] fanfou
- [ ] gnu social / statusnet
- [ ] mastodon

app settings:

- [ ] custom api
- [ ] custom consumer key/secrets
- [ ] official keys
- [ ] using [thumbor](https://github.com/thumbor/thumbor)
- [ ] connected through proxy
- [ ] media preview enabled

Index: 245

losing all our precious bookmarks can be saved using this



Index: 248
feature request: improved folder list
please search to check for an existing issue (including closed issues, for which the fix may not have yet been released) before opening a new issue: https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/issues?q=is%3aissue

### expected behavior
a clear list that i can tell a folder is classified in which class, and maybe sortable/filterable. it would be good if i can set the class without dive into folder config.

some example:
![ image ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8936513/42979515-366ba9d4-8c05-11e8-97c6-21f28080cb1f.png)
use text and background color to indicate the actual class, and use font color to indicate a class is explicit defined(black) or inherited(red).

### actual behavior
i need to dive into folder config to see which class am i using. it's annoying if i have dozens of label.
Index: 249
touch keyboard numeric/symbol screen keys are sent with the control modifier
```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. open a connection
2. touch and hold the menu button to bring up the touch keyboard
3. touch the "?123?" key in the bottom right of the touch keyboard
4. touch the ":" key

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?

the colon ":" key should be sent to the remote host. instead "control :"
(c-:) is sent.

what version of the product are you using? on what operating system?

androidvnc_build20100126.apk on a nexus one (android 2.1)

please provide any additional information below.

thanks for the great app!
```

original issue reported on code.google.com by `merpatte...@gmail.com` on 28 jan 2010 at 8:17

Index: 250
user information screen
i would like to implement the read-only user information (phone, email, etc) screen . (as far as i understand, there's no way to update most of the data via api, but please let me know if i'm wrong).

my suggestion for changes:

- under manage account remove "reconnect" (or the key icon , this option is not straightforward btw) and the trash icon
- once you click the name of the account, you get a user information screen and both options should be put in the options menu top right for consistency with the rest of the app

the reason for this change is that you can switch accounts already from the sidebar, so there's no point in having two places to do the same operation.

i appreciate all the suggestions and comments on this approach and also welcome the mockup for the user information screen .

cc @nextcloud/designers @andyscherzinger @tobiaskaminsky

Index: 251
request: widget
the simplemobile calendar widget is great; swiping to get a screen that has a full calendar is so useful.

i'd love to get a similar widget for draw, where it has a full screen canvas. just swipe and draw, basically. it would be even more excellent for taking notes, or quickly creating a diagram for help explaining something complex in conversations.
Index: 252
camera auto upload has a significant delay before actually uploading ("waiting to upload")
### actual behaviour
i just migrated from owncloud to nextcloud. i enabled the automatic upload feature for camera photos, which i was also using previously in the owncloud android app. when i take photos with the camera, the new photos are placed in nextcloud's uploads list and labeled "waiting to upload" where they sit for some time before actually uploading.

i frequently used the automatic upload feature in owncloud to take a photo with my phone and quickly have it available on my computer. the upload delay in the nextcloud app is frustrating.

### expected behaviour
new photos taken with the camera app should begin uploading immediately, as they did in the owncloud app.

### steps to reproduce
1. enable auto upload for camera photos
2. take a photo
3. observe the newly taken photo (s) are stuck in the nextcloud app uploads queue, labeled "waiting to upload"

### environment data
android version: 6.0.1

device model: moto g4 plus

stock or customized system: stock

nextcloud app version: 1.4.2

nextcloud server version: 11.0.2

### screenshot

![screenshot_20170330-183347](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2831985/24532933/0c8995a8-1579-11e7-97b0-d87bf1fa11de.png)

Index: 253
act on accessibility report (produced as part of ngi 0)
here is the report: [report_ngi_streetcomplete.pdf](https://github.com/westnordost/streetcomplete/files/4707633/report_ngi_streetcomplete.pdf)

thank you, yulia valencia from https://accessibility.nl for the report and mateusz for forwarding it to me. i have carefully read the report and determined the following action items:

~**enable users who are blind to use this app:**~
you need vision to contribute with this app at all. so the below are not applicable.
- [x] ~1.3.1 (a) connect checkboxes in "enabled" column in quest selection screen programmatically to the header column titled "enabled".~ will not fix, because this will only help text-to-speech systems for blind people
- [x] ~1.3.1 (b) add "quest completed" message when quest is completed~ will not fix, there is already audio feedback as well as an animation feedback
- [x] ~1.3.1 (c) add a textual indication what he loading indicator is doing, f.e. "loading..."~ well, i'd say this is will not fix as well, because mostly aimed at blind users plus it should be pretty clear that it is a loading indicator for other users due to the rotating circle being widely known as such.
- [x] ~4.1.2 add labels/state labels to buttons for text-to-speech~

**enable users who have problems with their eyes (but are not blind):**
- [x] 1.4.3 make text have more contrast, in particular, text buttons using the orange accent color . maybe make the orange a little darker.
- [x] 1.4.4 (a) the "n" on the compass should always have the same size, independent of the system font size
- [x] 1.4.4 (b) text on the map is not resized if the system font size is changed. the texts shown on the map should also get bigger if the system font size is bigger.
- [ ] related: #1769

**enable users who cannot use the touch screen to use this app:**
hmm, talkback navigation is likely a bigger topic. there is probably more to do than what is listed in the quick accessibility report. so, it is not will-not-fix but i will probably not do this. help is welcome, though.
- [ ] 2.1.1 talkback navigation for selecting the quests on the map
- [x] ~2.1.2~ this point is obsolete, report was based on old version of app
- [x] ~2.5.1 there should be buttons to control the map gestures like rotate and tilt~ tilting and rotating the map are not vital features for using this app properly, so there is little reason to clutter the ui for such unimportant functionality

**miscellaneous:**
- [ ] 3.3.2 use text hints like "type here" or similar for large input texts fields like for the "create note" dialog. the text field is only indicated by one horizontal line, some people might have difficulties to realize that one can type there. (this is not a will not fix, but i think it is rather unimportant because whoever has an android smartphone is used to seeing text fields that way. on the other hand, might consult the material design guidelines about if multiline textfields should maybe look different than the single-line ones)
