Index: 257
need some change requests
hi! we are 3 university students that are doing a course in software engineering and the goal of the course is to take a application like antennapod which we have choosen to do and to investigate it like software architecture design strategies and so on. we also have to investigate different design patterns which has been implemented in this application where we chose observer pattern, singleton and adaptor. we would like to double check that these patterns are being used in this application!?

another problem, for our next task we need to do a change/feature request, as this is a pretty large application and we are planning to do a bug fix/ change request. a couple of days ago there was a change request about changing the background color for something in the application. we were planning to take that but we can not find it anymore so we figured that someone did it already. are there any other easy change requests that the community has that we can do for our project?

(at the end of the project, we will have to submit a pull request so that we "give back" to the community)

thanks for helping us out!!
vikhram - lule√• university of technology

Index: 263
deleting cram/filter decks without reviewing cards seems to instigate changes although no cards seen
originally reported on google code with id 2024

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
the following steps likely require a source deck with certain properties, namely a
fair amount of new along with some due for review cards.
1. create a filter deck from some deck, using default values. you want the resulting
cram deck to either be all review cards, or at least have some review and some new.
2. without reviewing a single card, go delete the cram deck (which may crash due to
issue 2009, which has been addressed and will not be the cause of this issue)
3. repeat steps 1 and 2 until eventually you have only new cards in the cram deck.

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?
i would expect the exact same deck to be generated each time, with no changes. instead,
it is either handing me new cards (i don't know), or upon deleting the cram/filter
deck it is changing the scheduling or some other property of the cards such that they
appear new rather than as reviews. perhaps, it marks cards as "seen", such that the
default critera of oldest not seen is selecting a new set of cards, but, the cards
have not actually been seen! so this would not be a proper result.


does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?
i don't know and haven't tried.

what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look
at the title)

i was on a dev version, after the v2.1beta6 bump, specifically at commit 482ee8fb7afbbc...
in git.

on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version)
4.1.2


please provide any additional information below.

```

reported by `chajadan` on 2014-03-17 12:15:14

Index: 267
dialog explaining uploading of contact information is not presented
i installed riot from the play store yesterday. today i received a new incoming 1:1 conversation and went to the "conversations" screen for the first time. if i recall correctly, things happens in this order:

* i was prompted by android if i should provide access to my contacts - the purpose wasn't explained, but i assumed this would be for local purposes and riot would ask me before uploading them anywhere so i said yes
* i had a brief 1:1 chat
* i came back a little later. when i tried to open that 1:1 chat again i was yanked to a full screen prompt to approve the new vector identity server terms and conditions. i accepted them.
* suddenly i could see that a couple of people had showed up under "matrix users only" who had clearly been associated via an email address in my contacts. this was the first time i realised that i'd agreed to upload that information.
* i went to system settings and revoked the contacts permission for riot
* when the app re-launched, i finally received the dialog: "information: riot can check your address book to find other matrix users based on their email and phone numbers. if you agree to share your address book for this purpose, please allow access on the next pop-up". a little too late for that.

current behaviour: information dialog appears not to fire reliably, and is a passive notice.

expected behaviour: app waits for positive (yes/no) confirmation from user that uploading contact data is what they want to do, and does not trigger access to the contacts until that confirmation is received.
Index: 268
video controls blocked off by android navigation buttons
in the latest version of twidere from google play, the video controls are blocked off by android's navigation bar (back/home/apps). when i tap the screen to hide the android navigation bar, it also hides the video controls. this makes it impossible to unmute videos, seek to a specific time, restart playback, etc.

![screenshot_2017-08-06-12-45-04](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/601567/29005692-6c1572d4-7aa6-11e7-8a19-3eb778b7cb69.png)

## expected behavior
i expect the video controls to appear above the android buttons, or to appear when the android bar is hidden.

## actual behavior
the android navigation bar blocks the video controls, preventing them from being used.

## steps to reproduce
open a video in twidere by pressing the play icon that appears over the thumbnail.

## extra info

android version: 5.1.1

network type:

- [x] cellular
- [x] wi-fi

app version: 3.6.23

build variant:

- [x] google
- [ ] f-droid

micro-blogging service:

- [x] twitter
- [x] fanfou
- [x] gnu social / statusnet
- [x] mastodon

app settings:

- [ ] custom api

Index: 271
fr: sleep timer: please treat play/pause toggle as shake.
---
during the ducked audio volume that is signaling impending timer time-out, override "pause" with sleep timer reset.
---

**app version**: 1.6.2.3 f-droid

**desired behaviour**: waive off sleep-timer with single action.

**current behaviour**: sleep-timer timeout requires either patiently waiting out onsleeptimeralmostexpired or pressing play/pause 3 times.

**steps to reproduce**:

1) be awake as timer time out is approaching;
onsleeptimeralmostexpired
audio volume drops significantly signaling an impending pause...

(this continues for several seconds, which would give me time to grab the phone and shake.
but i'm not planning to shake, i'm planning to push the super convenient bluetooth play/pause toggle button on my headphones or automotive fm<->bluetooth dongly thing. or maybe the phone is in the little dashboard gpsesqe mount, and i want to press the on- screen >/" toggle. )

2) impatiently fail to wait for playback to pause, and press play/pause toggle too soon.
playback is stopped...

3) oops, too soon; press the toggle button again...
audio returns at full volume, everything is perf...
onsleeptimerexpired is finally reached and playback is stopped.

4) press play/pause a third time. finally resuming full volume play with timer reset.


**environment**: auto-enabled sleep timer, bluetooth thingy or screen easier to reach than shaking phone.

the onresult method should be called once to show the final result.

Index: 273

Index: 274
user feedback for riotx
hello devs / designers,

we did a test with some beta users with riotx and i wanted to give you the feedback:

* red numbers (unread messages) are indicating "urgent action required", however it is only unread messages. suggestion from our designer: change the colour for non critical messages to non-red.
* some channels have red unread message number indicators, some have black message unread messages indicator and it is not clear to the users what means what.
* battery draining warning is appearing on samsung s7
* android notifications seem to be default for all messages, not mentions, which is overwhelming for all tested users
* profile picture cannot be changed - this was the first action taken by some users and they got scared that the app is not usable at all because of this feature not working
* colour overload in the chats: compared to other messaging systems, there are a lot of different colours in each channel, which makes the user experience confusing ("what do colours indicate?")

i know that this is again a list of issues like i reported in https://github.com/vector-im/riot-web/issues/12279 for riot-web, but i hope this input is valuable nonetheless.

Index: 275
replace old navigation with new navigation

**is your feature request related to a problem? please describe.**

one of the final steps in implementing the new navigation is to delete the old navigation . this will delete a bunch of old code and files and should simplify developing the new navigation system. by e.x. deleting home_url, guaranteeing that it is no longer accessible.


**describe the solution you'd like**

kiwixmainactivity should be replaced by the newnavigationactivity, which will then be renamed kiwixmainactivity (in the app module).

**describe alternatives you've considered**

keep the old navigation system until later, but this will complicate development as some changes would require work in both the old naviagation, and new navigation systems.
**additional context**

this is part of the new navigation ticket.

Index: 278
hotp confusingly shows countdown yellow bar
#### general information

* **app version:** 0.7.0
* **app source:** f-droid
* **android version:** 10
* **custom rom:** grapheneos

an htop, or event-based otp, is only renewed when the user requests a new one, as such, there is no concept of time countdown for hotps.

#### expected result
**what is expected?**
hotps should not present the user with a countdown, in the form of the yellow bar at the top of the token, especially if the only entry in andotp is a hotp.

**what does happen instead?**
the yellow bar representing the 30 seconds appears above the hotp, leading users to believe the token will only be valid until the bar empties out, or that it will automatically regenerate when the bar empties out.

#### logcat
```
( design issue, not needed)
```

#### steps to reproduce

* add an hotp to andotp

Index: 281
customized accounts' colour doesn't display in the timeline
hi all,

it seems like twidere doesn't conform to **customized accounts' colour ** but rather sticks to predefined account's colour , even if customized later on.

## expected behavior

i customized the colour of my mastodon and twitter accounts. expecting these colours to display **as customized** to the right-hand side of my timeline.

## actual behavior

colours displaying to the right-hand side of my timeline are not the customized ones, but the default/original ones (chosen by twidere). restarting twidere or rebooting my handset doesn't solve the issue.

## steps to reproduce

1/ check which colour is assigned by twidere to a newly defined user account (whichever social network it belongs to i believe).
2/ customize the colour of this user account by accessing your account's profile > menu > define colour option.
3/ go to your timeline, identify a tweet coming from this user account and check which colour displays to the right-hand side (currently **not** the customized colour , which is a mistake imo).

## extra info

android version: 6.0

network type:

- [x] cellular
- [ ] wi-fi

app version: 3.6.21

build variant:

- [ ] google
- [x] f-droid

- [x] twitter
- [ ] fanfou
- [ ] gnu social / statusnet
- [x] mastodon

- [?] custom api
- [?] custom consumer key/secrets

tapping the "edit" button on an inserted video should open a specific dialog, not the image editing one
![wpid-screenshot_2015-04-27-22-37-14](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/40213/7430004/79751208-f00c-11e4-8673-1a2caa1a5902.png)

Index: 289
[improvement] smooth camera movement
### description
currently, the camera sticks completely to the character when it is walking. the character can only walk into eight directions that are multiples of 45 degrees. this means, the camera movement is not very smooth because it suddenly changes direction when the character makes a turn.


### user experience
the problem with the current camera behaviour is that the abrupt movements impact most of the content that is displayed on the screen . the image filling the largest area of the screen is moving and changing directions suddenly during the whole gaming experience. this is very exhausting and tiring for the eyes over time. that's why smoother camera movements would vastly improve the comfort while playing the game.

### suggested behavior
* the camera should speed up smoothly, so that it doesn't change instantly from not moving to moving at the full speed of the character.
* the camera should follow a smoothened path, so that it doesn't change direction abruptly in steps of 45¬∞.

is there anything i can do to retain my favorite images / let the pro version not delete my favorite marks?

hi all, not sure if this is the correct thread but i got a similar issue. the app freeze and soon crash itself. there's no particular situation for this. it can happens soon as i open k-9, or after opening or browsing through emails. btw, reopen the app for the second or the third time it usually works without further freeze. i use xprivacy but i totally disable it for k-9 (and anyway i was previously give all permission, just to be sure).

**/sbin/sh: exec: line 1: logcat: not found**

Index: 295
[feature request] video recommendation page
one of the biggest problem of newpipe comparing to youtube app is the lack of recommended videos in homepage. newpipe have a static trending video page which mostly doesn't change in a day and then we have "whats new" and channel pages which doesn't add **diversity**. surfing with newpipe becomes boring after sometime unless we know what we want and search for it. for these problems i recommend adding a recommendation page to newpipe main screen . i know youtube recommendtion is youtube's proprietary api which newpipe may not have and because of this i am suggesting this solution.

when we open any youtube video page in newpipe it also simultaneously adds next recommended videos for that video
![alt text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teamnewpipe/newpipe/dev/fastlane/metadata/android/en-us/images/teninchscreenshots/shot_12.png)
_look at the right of this image with next video suggestion showing list of videos_

i would recommend randomly selecting some videos from these suggested videos list and save those details in an **external file** with certain file size limits(to prevent it from growing more). as we surf we will visit many video pages and we get suggested more of these videos then details of those can be saved in that external file. we can then use the video list in this external file to create a recommended page for home screen .

i'd gladly do the work myself if given instructions on how to achieve this, i'm not really a programmer but i'm totally willing to try

implement material theme on people list, details and invite screens

i expect issues with the flow layout we are using for usernames/email entry. maybe we can switch them to chips?
Index: 298
feed view isn't refreshed on sync
steps to reproduce:
- go to the android news app, sync the state and click on "all unread items"
- a list with all unread items appear
- go to your pc, open owncloud, read some items right in your browser (to verify that there is a new "read state" in your owncloud
- go to your android news app and swipe to the right (to get into the sidebar)
- a sync is triggered now and the unread count is updated
- swipe to the left (to go back to the unread items view)
- this view isn't updated (see picture - left side: 8 unread items but on the right side you only see 4) (in my case new items appear in my rss feed, but it's the same behaviour with reading items - the already read ones are still there)

![screenshot_2013-09-17-11-00-51](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/245432/1155885/4180beb6-1f79-11e3-86ca-7466ac9c2ecd.png)

Index: 300

there has to be a way we can alter each individual icon so that they do not look out of proportions with each other. for example, you only offer three ways to enlarge the icons. the "lastpass" icon is so small that the only way to see it legible and read it is to set the zoom to the 3x setting making some of the icons look out of proportion to the other. can this be fixed, please?

Index: 302
two issues with whiteboard - can't click "hints"/"summary" drop downs, and studying from top-level decks doesn't remember sub-deck settings
whoops, hit enter and it submitted it, one sec...

i love that the whiteboard feature is a thing, though it took me a while to figure out how to use. i guess i have a few enhancements that would make using it feel more intuitive .

first, i have cards that use hints and drop-down information in the form of "summary" tags that i can't use unless i disable whiteboard, which is a bit of an annoyance, especially when i have full screen enabled so that i can scroll on whiteboard enabled cards; swiping down and disabling whiteboard just so i can click one thing then repeating it to enable it is a bit cumbersome. i know someone mentioned it before; it would be really useful to be able to use two fingers to scroll when not in full screen mode, but that's a separate issue. it would be nice if there were some way to get it to ignore whiteboard when tapping "links" or other things that are interactive (summary tags, audio buttons, etc.). maybe having the whiteboard display "behind" text, or just links/summary tags/audio buttons?

the other thing is that i really only want the whiteboard to function on a certain card type; the deck(s) i'm using are in this type of hierarchy:

top level
--- non-writing cards
--------- sub-deck 1
--------- sub-deck 2
--- writing cards

i have the "writing" deck with whiteboard enabled, and the "non-writing" deck with it disabled, in hopes that i could get around the lack of scrolling/unhiding issue, but if i just study from "top level" it ignores the setting of the sub-decks. maybe if the whiteboard was a part of the deck options menu and there was an option to "use settings of sub-deck" along with enabled/disabled?

what would be really cool and would help with all of these issues is if there were a specific thing we could put in the cards themselves that acts as a mini-whiteboard, like a {{whiteboard}} tag. even cooler would be the ability to use something as a background (e.g. {{whiteboard:stroke order diagram}}). i'm sure this stuff is a lot of work, but it's the squeaky wheel that gets the oil, so i figured i should speak up a bit. thank you for all of your work on anki and ankidroid thus far ‚ô°

## expected behavior

## actual behavior
certain issues arise, including things not getting stored/can't be restored, as well as abnormal ui behavior.

for example, an export done from the f-droid build can't restore the tabs in a google build import.

another issue is that regardless of which build you use, the top tab bar reverses its hiding method. normally, you have to scroll up to show up the top bar, & down to hide it. after importing, this reverses so that scrolling down shows it & scrolling up hides it.

Index: 315
media in local device media store aren't added to editor
it looks like a change [here](https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/wordpress-android/blob/e91f3708f7cef702c2c39a1019d659a2e8f975aa/wordpress/src/main/java/org/wordpress/android/ ui /posts/editpostactivity.java#l1869-l1890) has caused the `appendmediafile()` call to be skipped for media already in the local media store (url starts with `content://media`), which means those media aren't added to the editor (but are uploaded to the site anyway).

### steps to reproduce the behavior

when launching the native media picker, select media from a source that will provide a `content://media` url (local media store).

one example is the gallery app in older stock android. for example, in a 5.0.0 genymotion emulator:

![missing-editor-images-step-2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9613966/24975962/982cb75e-1f95-11e7-8c15-2df94111d5ee.png)

any media added from the 'gallery' source should upload, but won't be added to the editor.
Index: 316
new bookmark and bookmark labels
i would like more easy way to create new bookmark and assign a label to it.

**is your feature request related to a problem? please describe.**
1. i select a verse and "bookmark labels" is not available.
2. i tap "bookmark" button to add bookmark and screen is refreshed - the selection is lost.
3. i select the verse again and here is "bookmark labels". now i am able to assign a label to my new bookmark.

**describe the solution you'd like**
1. "bookmark labels" menu could be visible always

2.1. under "bookmark labels", i would like sub menu with labels plus "manage bookmark labels" (which will open "bookmark labels" screen ).

2.2. alternatively, long press the bookmark button could show popup menu with labels.
right now, long press will show hint/description - "add bookmark". the popup menu could include this hint/description.

3. probably the menu must show only the top 5-10 most recently used bookmark labels.
example, if you start learning a new subject, then for your first bookmark you go to "bookmark labels" screen and add a new label. for your next bookmark you will be able to use the bookmarks menu.

there could be different and better ways for this.

Index: 318
delete watch history that is older than certain period of time




#### describe the feature you want



add an option to delete history that is older than a certain period of time automatically (for example, a week; a month; 3 month; 1 year)

#### is your feature request related to a problem? please describe it




#### additional context





#### how will you/everyone benefit from this feature?



i think there are certain advantage to this:
1. privacy, since the history is deleted it is impossible for others to obtain a long term watch pattern of a person.
2. save space, the watch history (including what part of the video has been watched) can gets really large after years of use
3. it does not hurt convenience, i personally never found myself in need of finding videos that i watched weeks ago. but i do sometimes need to use history to find what is the last video i have watched.

Index: 325
notes fails to connect with http status-code 301 or 302
i believe this started happening when the shift to using android accounts with the files app happened, since it seemed that before that, notes would do its own requests rather than piggy-backing on the files account.

### steps to reproduce
1. successfully authorise account with files app
2. open notes app
3. attempt to authorise account
4. observe failure

### expected behaviour
- notes should successfully connect

### actual behaviour
- notes gives "oh no - what now? :disappointed:" error. logs below.

### can you reproduce this problem on https://try.nextcloud.com?
- yes, they issue 302 redirects.

### environment data
android version: api 29

device model: xiaomi mi 9t (davinci)

stock or customized system: stock

nextcloud app version: files app 3.12.1, notes app 2.16.3 (f-droid)

nextcloud server version: nextcloud 18.0.6, notes version 3.6.0

reverse proxy: apache, via rewriterule [l,r=301]. also occurs when issuing 302 redirects.

apache and nextcloud are both running within docker. the linux client and web interface work properly. my docker image is based off nextcloud:18-apache, approximately following this example: https://github.com/nextcloud/docker/tree/master/.examples/dockerfiles/cron/apache

inability to switch between different libraries
## bug report

- [y] i have tested with the last (dev) version of the software.

### step 2: what is your environment?
* version of the software you use : avd of pixel 2 with api 27, ted business, tedx 2014

### step 3: describe the problem:

#### steps to reproduce:

* download the two zim files: ted business and tedx 2014 from the get content page
* once the files are downloaded, go to the tedx library
* now switch from tedx to ted business through the get content menu
* tedx along with all its content appears on screen instead of ted business
...

Index: 328
not able to upload image on account activity . empty snackbar being displaying.
while testing the application i was not able to upload a new image . after some time of uploading the image , an empty snackbar is displayed. there can be two bugs in this thing:

1. if we are able to upload the image to the server , the image is not being shown on the imageview, and also an empty snackbar is displayed.
2. there can be one more test case if the image is not being uploaded , there should be an error message which should be displayed on the snackbar.


**reproduce the test cases**
1. go to the navigation drawer
2. click on the imageview on the top left. this prompts you to the account activity
3. click on the imageview present at the account activity
4. choose an image to upload
5. the image will not be uploaded to the server and set to the imageview
6. empty snackbar appears after 5-10 secs of uploading of image

**expected behavior**
the behaviour should be as follows:-
1. we should be able to upload the image to the server with imageview being replaced with the new image .
2. if there is an error we should get a snackbar with required details



**screenshots**
i am providing with link of screen record which will help to visualize the bug more effectively
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pgidvwhrovaz4h2vo47dzhgadinufewc/view?usp=sharing

**smartphone info:**
device: one plus 5
android version: android 9

**additional context**


**would you like to work on the issue?**

- [x] yes
- [ ] no


Index: 329
cost for multiple units of the same type is wrong
**describe the bug**
i've been producing a unit for some turns. say it took 30 at the start and 19 now, just because i put in production. if i look at the costs to produce that same unit again (add 1 to the queue), it will say 19. that is wrong, it should be 30.

in this example i've been working on a worker for several turns, but as you see every next worker will show 19 turns. it might be that this calculation resets when the first item of the queue is produced, haven't checked that.

Index: 334
stats aren't updating to the current day in the background after the date changes
> since i updated to android 10 last week [stats - daily view in] the app doesn't automatically go to the current day. it only goes as far as the last day i opened the app from scratch. i updated to the latest version of the app (feb, 2020) but still have the same issue.

> you must close the app and reopen it in order for it to show the current day's site stats. once you have reopened it, it does refresh the stats during the course of the day but will not automatically advance on the next day unless you close and reopen the app.

> if i drag my finger downwards to update it does not go to the current date. it only shows me the dates up to the yesterday's date.

* reported in 2761834-zen (internal reference)
* wordpress - 14.2 - version code: 831
* android device name: samsung sm-n960u
* site type: jetpack free plan

additional recommended troubleshooting steps:

1. verify that your blog and your device are both set to the same timezone.
1. if possible, please get a copy of your app logs from account > application log > copy icon (top right) and then send them to us in the app using the contact us form in the account > help & support section of the app _right after_ triggering the problem by doing a pull-to-refresh and seeing it fail for the days stats screen on a day you did not close and re-open the app since the previous day. it would be helpful to see if any relevant or helpful logs are generated **and** it needs to be just after triggering the problem and then copying the logs right afterward.
1. please try going to android settings > apps & notifications > wordpress app > storage & cache and tapping the "clear cache" option. does the problem persist the next day?

note: sounds very similar to the ios issue at https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/wordpress-ios/issues/12823. ü§î

h/t @erricgunawan for the original report. thank you!

Index: 338
rooms without an icon with names starting with an emoji do now show the emoji in the autogenerated icon
i use tulir's mautrix hangouts bridge, and because the bridge doesn't let me change the room icon , i devised a workaround where i add an emoji as the first charachter in the hangouts conversation name, that gets pulled into matrix as the room name, and the the room icon will have that emoji instead of a letter, making it easier to spot because many rooms and conversations start with the same letter and have the same color .

unfortunately that little hack does not work with riot x at the moment, i just get a rotated square with a ? instead, see the picture below. this is not a huge deal (and i don't know if many other people take advantadge of this) but would be nice to address at some point.

and since i'm talking about putting emojis in room icons already, i'd like to mention one idea i had been thinking about: distinctive room icons are really useful for quickly jumping between rooms, especially when you have many of them. but lot of people don't go through the truble of changing them. it has crossed my mind that perhaps it would be interesting to allow the user to easily make an emoji the room icon (particularly for 1 on 1 conversations). this could perhaps take the form of a button that randomizes the room emoji icon or let's the user pick one. and perhaps it would be interesting to allow the user to enable random emoji icons as a default for new conversations. just food for thought :)

thanks!


![ image ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12504176/62827589-b64ca980-bb86-11e9-8f98-5bb084acb5df.png)

Index: 339
prevent video controls from disappearing while using them
i suggest a change to the on- screen video controls. it would be nice if the controls do not disappear while using them.

currently, if i am playing a video podcast and hit the 30sec ff button (on the screen ) several times, the controls will eventually disappear, no matter how frequently i am hitting the ff button. i can be rapidly hitting that button, and all of a sudden they on- screen controls disappear. obviously they come right back after touching the screen again, but it may be nice to prevent them from going away.

it is good to have the on- screen controls disappear eventually, however, i suggest to keep the controls on- screen for a minimum number of seconds after touching a playback control button. maybe 5 seconds. then the controls should disappear after that.

hopefully i am clear in my description.

Index: 359
kiss settings.
i've just installed riot and settings are very frightening! so long and full of complex stuff. which is something we must avoid for regular users, since they are not that into software and want things as simple and clear as possible. i propose to follow a different schema:

right now:

---------------------------------

**user settings**

profile picture
display name
change password
email
...

**local contacts**
phonebook country


** user interface **
{lots of buttons}

**home display**
{...}

**flair**
{there's literally nothing here}

**background notification**
{...}

**labs**
{...}

#**ignored users**
{...}

**cryptography**
{...}

**devices**
{...}

**advanced**
{...}

**analytics**
{...}

**other**
{...}

**deactivate account**
deactivate account


the way i propose:

---------------------------------

**user settings** *(including account deactivation and "phonebook country" and maybe "advanced" (maybe renamed "info about your connection"))*

** user interface **

**home display**

**background notification**

**advanced settings** (and inside there's these menus, but i agree if you want to show them like they're right now (as far as they're inside "advanced settings"))
- **labs**
- **cryptography**
- **devices**
- **analytics**

**other**

--------------

it works by clicking the name of the setting menu to access to all the configuration. so, to change any ** user interface ** configuration i would need to open the menu, and click on ** user interface ** so i can see all these settings (the bunch of buttons i named above). some good examples of how this works are *andstatus* and *slide for reddit*.

this way, the user has more time to discover the menu without being so impressed about all of these configurations s/he doesn't know about. fediverse is already frightening, so i think keeping things simple and clean would help a lot. and it's aesthetically way better imo.

also, including a searcher in the upper bar would be a nice feature as well.

Index: 367
consistent clickable set text & icon
@xvicarious back in 2017, you added some code to view all cards from a set when clicking on that set's code in a cardview (https://github.com/aefeinstein/mtg-familiar/commit/b45005743d5709113f614bcbabda1a6f290f78be). since then, i replaced that `textview` with the set's icon , but i didn't also make that icon clickable.

gold in wall bug, and graphical bug
see images on https://imgur.com/a/cw4iqpl

on the first image , you can see gold in the wall on the king of dwarves' floor. the player died, in a previous run, in the area of the king of dwarves. in the next play through, there was (probably due to the picking up of bones, but that is unconfirmed) gold in the walls. this bug is definitely on the most recent public (non-beta) version of the game.

on the second image , you can see that the game over sprite overlaid over the menu. this bug took place on 30/06 (june)/2018; i don't know exactly what version that is. :/
Index: 369
feature request: screen allways on in kore
when listening to music with the tv off it would be nice if the screen of tablet/phone stays on. a switch to enable/disable this would be nice.

Index: 370
hex passwd on android 8.1 +
hi.
i use your app for a long time.
didn't checked properly into source code, but around april 2018 aosp heavily changed vdc and now, password does not need to be provided as hex anymore.
this lead into issues while on release after april 2018.

gonna check another time, but mostly, after successfully changing the device password, it gets displayed on the screen , but never work.
as a workaround, twrp is able to decrypt as it try both version of the password (plain text and hex converted one).

is there anyway to check somwhere and disable password change for such devices until fixed?
i am aware of this issue but don't think every one using your app will.

thanks in advance

Index: 376
ui more layered
the current layout is a bit technical. i propose a few more layers.
make advanced settings just settings.
make settings 'security'
float identity selection to main screen
make a 'manage identities' button (give it the identity selection)
move import export rekey change password create new under manage
move import from text under import (add a button to camera or add an extra submenu.

this removes the more technical parts from the casual user, and gives more room for some explanations.
Index: 377
allow to use it as hands-free system

## feature suggestion
**detailed description**

it would be nice if im able to cumunicat from a mobile phone to a tv user.
may also as singel channel or as walkie-talkie only transfer if you longpress a button.


### context


* i would use it to shout my children because they have to finish tv and appear at table for dinner.
* use it as loudspeaker at parties.




### possible implementation

kind of a walkie-talkie, longpress the middle button on the steering cross.
* initiated on kodi-app, have a mic- icon on the sidebar. tick on it a hovering button appear which either show available devices or if longpress open a channel to this user.
if phone is on silent mode you could not get contacted.

* initiated from tv show a list of available people. then every longpress contact the same. normal short click then also list other contacts.
after 10min of not using the long click at first shows available devices. and last used is marked. if you still press the buton another 3s the last used contact get activated and the channel open.
Index: 378

this is part of the **unified login & sign-up** project.

### expected behavior
disabled buttons should have the new style shown in the design spec (outlined with no fill, with light gray text) ‚Äî internal ref: pbarwn-ma-p2.

### actual behavior
disabled buttons are not outlined and have a gray fill.

Index: 383
select folder with long name
i encounter the same problem as @christophe-95 in https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/issues/4312#issuecomment-583828779. there is no way to select a folder (without trial and error):
![ image ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4856462/76763190-eef2d800-6792-11ea-903d-c86c5787e5fa.png)

since the issue #4312 is closed, i thought i open a new one.

### expected behavior
i want to open a folder with a long name. i would expect to have a way to filter/search for a folder similar to the filter/search function in the "folder management screen ".

alternatively a horizontal scrollbar might be an option.

### actual behavior
folders with a long path, cannot be selected and opened reliably, because the folder name is truncated.

### environment
k-9 mail version: 5.707

android version: 8.1.0

account type (imap, pop3, webdav/exchange): imap

Index: 386
bolding of some user-supplied font looks ugly
originally reported on google code with id 1247

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. set it up so cards use some specific bold fonts.

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?
the fonts should appear bolded, like in the "sinngehalt_desktop.png" images done with
the desktop client.. instead they appear with a strange border effect, as seen in "baumaterial_android.png"

does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?
this happens with some fonts and not with others.
but with those fonts, it happens all the time.

what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look
at the title)
on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version)
ankidroid 2.0.7beta
android 4.0.3


if it is a crash or "force close" and you can reproduce it, the following
would help immensely: 1) install the "sendlog" app, 2) reproduce the crash,
3) immediately after, launch sendlog, 4) attach the resulting file to this
report. that will make the bug much easier to fix.


please provide any additional information below.
i am not 100% sure that it is related to otf fonts, but it appears that ttf-fonts are
bolded correctly and otf fonts are not.

in the image , the three good looking kanji are done with the fonts
ipapmincho.ttf
motoyalmaru.ttf
epson gyousho.otf

the offending kanji is in
moon font.otf

the left part of the bottom line is in
ipapmincho.ttf

the ugly right part in
praxis lt.otf


unfortunately, the bad looking fonts are either large or non-free, so i can't really
append one of those.

i'll try it with a few other fonts.


```

Index: 387
enchancement: allow volume keys to scroll in message view
### desired behavior
k-9 mail almost entirely works on non-touch screen android devices like this one: https://www.sonimtech.com/xp5/
the biggest problem is that there is no way to scroll through the text of a message. could a feature be added where the volume keys could be optional used to scroll through the text of a message like they can be used to scroll through list views? if off by default, like the current volume key options, this should be a completely unobtrusive addition for the average user.

### background for request
i am hoping to deploy rugged phones using k-9 mail in a developing world relief context where waterproof and rugged phones with long battery life are a big benefit. a secure open source email client that would work on these would be a big benefit. k-9 mail + audio recorder + autocrypt would provide an open/secure alternative to whatsapp.

i'm willing to do most of the coding work on this if someone could give me some pointers and if the idea was approved by the developer.

### actual behaviour

### can you reproduce this problem on https://try.nextcloud.com?
i don't want to upload my personal files to a public server. however, my server works fine and everything else works, so i determined it's a problem in the app.

currently in riot-web:

image " src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3940906/80947396-6555a300-8df0-11ea-8dc8-ee8b3bb9c0ce.png">
event content when avatar is added to a room

we may have some different design on mobile, and it should be maybe a good idea to also render the previous avatar, if available.

```json
{
"content": {
"url": "mxc://matrix.org/tiqcgveknwklalitoopgttpq"
},
"event_id": "$15885932948479ocrog:matrix.org",
"origin_server_ts": 1588593294584,
"sender": "@benoit.marty:matrix.org",
"state_key": "",
"type": "m.room.avatar",
"unsigned": {
"age": 124
},
"room_id": "!dxrltjcjmznvfrqied:matrix.org"
}
```

event content when avatar is updated:

```json
{
"content": {
"url": "mxc://matrix.org/grwnfwinchajzfwssbixbikp"
},
"event_id": "$1588576397318626sjczv:matrix.org",
"origin_server_ts": 1588576397040,
"sender": "@manu:matrix.org",
"state_key": "",
"type": "m.room.avatar",
"unsigned": {
"replaces_state": "$144803362719096zkzai:matrix.org",
"prev_content": {
"url": "mxc://matrix.org/lgpbndhcdxzgwjkpirccnhoq"
},
"prev_sender": "@manu:matrix.org",
"age": 3596616
},
"room_id": "!gzvmkcfnoiomxzaqgi:matrix.org"
}
```

it's maybe also a good opportunity to also handle user avatar change, since it will be nearly the same treatment and rendering (?)

also please update #78 when it's done

Index: 410
after attempting to make a video call, i tried to write a message to the same recipient. the keyboard starts behaving odd; spaces don't work, backspace doesn't work, keys typed aren't seen. finally backing out with the left triangle of android, the screen goes black and no activity. of course hitting the back triangle again kills the app.

Index: 411
fall back to another font instead of showing boxes
originally reported on google code with id 779

```
as reported in issue 742, the shared deck "koine greek all nt words - mounce 3rd ed"
displays squares/boxes instead of accented greek characters, even when an appropriate
font is present in the ankidroid/fonts folder. i think this is because the deck specifies
"font-family: arial unicode ms" in the card layout , but that font isn't present on
the device. renaming a greek font to "arial unicode ms.ttf" seems to solve the problem.

when a font is specified in the card layout , but is not present in the ankidroid/fonts
folder, it'd be nice if ankidroid could detect other fonts in the folder that contain
the required characters, and automatically fall back to those fonts.
```

reported by `mikemorr.com` on 2011-09-06 00:37:27

Index: 412
mapping rp15 api to app models
we have the following fields under speaker
- name
- information
- linkedin url
- twitter url
- profile pic url

under event
- title
- sub title
- keynote list
- date
- time
- abstract text
- description
- venue
- track
- moderator

we need to map these fields from the api

Index: 413
user not warned when using an unencrypted server connection. (add connection security status icon )
first, nextcloud is awesome! keep up the good work!

### actual behaviour
when using the nextcloud app to connect to a nextcloud server over an unencrypted connection, the user is not warned that the connection is **not** secure. this does not happen at first nor subsequent logins.

### expected behaviour
when a user attempts to connect to a nextcloud server over an unencrypted connection, the user should be warned that their connection is not protected/private, and that their data is at risk.
currently the app **does** display this kind of warning when connecting to a server that has a **self-signed** certificate. so i think it makes sense to also warn when encryption is not in use at all.

one could argue that a user should already know if a server is using encryption based on the connection information they enter, or that nextcould should never be available over an unencrypted channel, and i would have to agree. but i still think they deserve the warning.

#### ui suggestion:
add an icon or some other indication that the connection to the server is secure.
or
add an icon or some other indication only when the connection is **not** secure.

### steps to reproduce
1. set up nextcloud, but do not configure encryption (https) on the web server.
2. as admin, set up a new user.
3. use the nextcloud android app to connect to the server and log in for the first time as the new user.
4. observe that no warning is presented to the user regarding the lack of connection security.
5. after the initial log-in, restart the app to reconnect.
6. observe that no warning is presented.


### environment data
android version: **6.0**

device model: (**generic**)

stock or customized system: **stock**

nextcloud app version: **3.3.0**

nextcloud server version: **14**

Index: 414
precise custom theme
it woul be useful to make possible to chose background/head/font/ icon colors separately
(make a black and white theme at first)
Index: 415
tapping on an unloaded image stalls the ui
`v0.13`

when i scroll up, sometimes images don‚Äôt get loaded immediately (even though i guess they are cached locally?). when i tap on such a placeholder which lacks its image , the ui freezes. i then have to either tap on android‚Äôs ‚Äúback‚Äù button, or wait until the image loads up, and then there is some chance that then tapping a second time on the image enlarges it and unfreezes the ui .
Index: 416

hey, great app! just some thoughts from me for possible optimizing of the used screen space.

it would be great when the available screen space would be used to make the icon picker a bit bigger since there is a lot of blank screen .
the area could then show multiple lines of icons. this would make searching for a specific icon or just strolling through them much better/easier.

Index: 417

Index: 418
too much whitespace at the bottom of the page
since fixing the page-offset calculations, we often have a lot of whitespace at the bottom of the page (between pagenumber and text).

this might be caused by a new bug in the calculation, but since that's fairly well covered by unit tests now, it's more likely that it's a layout problem (reporting too little space).

Index: 420
apod does not add the podast if the connection fails.
hi

maybe it makes sense to not to add a podcast, but the thing is there could be temporary connection issues with the podcast providers.

here is a scenario. i have 60 podcasts in an opml file. i import it and some of them fail during import and apod does not add them. they are not listed. well what if the connection issue is temporary from the server? sometimes the providers might get hit with lots of request which disables their response?

i think that it will make more sense if apod adds the all the podcasts during import but show some icon or gray it out next to the listing (not in downloads window) to show that it failed during the import. and maybe it will come back during another refresh.

it is a bit confusing this way because hard to keep track of which ones made it back whioch ones are not.

Index: 432
[feature request] google assistant - app actions
## feature suggestion
**detailed description**
implement a couple of app actions like:
play/pause

it'd work like this:
user says: "hey google tell kore to play" - playback resumes
user says: "hey google tell kore to pause" - playback pauses

optionally, if for privacy or other reasons necessary there could be a toggle in the settings to enable/disable actions

### context
as i user would like to control my kodi player through the kore app with my voice so that i don't have to touch my phone and i can have a more pleasant user experience .

this would allow me to control kodi from smart devices without using my hand(s)

### additional context, screenshots or links
here are some relevant links or screenshots:

https://developers.google.com/assistant/app/overview


*note: team kodi will consider this item however we will not make any promises if it will be included.*

Index: 434
add "system default" theme option.




#### describe the feature you want



i would like newpipe theme to follow android theme
#### is your feature request related to a problem? please describe it



if i change android theme, it won't change newpipe theme.
#### additional context




#### how will you/everyone benefit from this feature?



it will need less effort to change theme of my apps (apps without system theme option, including newpipe).
it would also fix https://github.com/teamnewpipe/newpipe/issues/1535 for people who can set a system-wide theme settings (correct me if i'm wrong, android 10+ users, lineageos 16 (and custom roms based on lineage 16), and other custom roms implementing system-wide theme settings).

Index: 438
invalid bookmark creation on android
_from @kelson42 on april 9, 2016 19:56_

1 - click many times on "random" and "bookmark" icons in the action bar (to create dozens of random bookmarks
2 - open the bookmarks (long clikc on bookmark icon )
3 - part of the bookmarks listed are listed as content://org.kiwix.zim.base/..... and trying to open these bookmark opens the welcome page of the current zim file

the problem probably happens if the html is not fully loaded at the time the bookmark icon is clicked. then the title of the page is probably unknown (html not fully parsed).

imo, if the page is not fully loaded the bookmarking code should be triggered one time the page is loaded (non blocking).


_copied from original issue: kiwix/kiwix#20_

Index: 447
hardware keyboard support
**app version:** `1.7.2b` and `2.0.0-rc6` (from f-droid)

**problem you are having**: navigating (arrow keys) or starting/stopping with space key on [samsung s4 keyboard cover ej-ft830](https://www.samsung.com/us/mobile/mobile-accessories/tablets/galaxy-tab-s4-book-cover-keyboard-ej-ft830ubeguj/) (i have the specific model `ej-ft830ubeguj` but i guess other models like `ej-ft830bbegde` are affected as well) does not work (**update:** it also doesn't work on `ef-dt860`).

i'm not quite sure whether this is a new feature and shortcuts on hardware keyboards don't work in general or whether it is related to particular keycodes(?) on certain models. but if i can help to debug in some way, just ask.

**screenshots / drawings / technical details**:

usually shortcuts like these are common:

| keyboard shortcut | action |
| ------------------------- | -------- |
| space bar | pause/play the video |
| enter key | pause/play the video |
| m or m | mute/unmute video volume |
| up and down arrow keys | raise and lower volume by 10% |
| right and left arrow keys | move forward or backward by 5 seconds |
| 0 to 9 number keys | go to 0% to 90% of the video |
| f or f | enter or exit fullscreen (note: to exit fullscreen you can also press the esc key) |
| c or c | show/hide closed captioning |

(i took the table from my first search result)

**model:** `sm-t835` and also `sm-t860`
**os:** `one ui 1.1 / android 9`, `one ui 2.1 / android 10`

loading deck. please wait... dialog appearing for 5x longer than version 0.6alpha3
originally reported on google code with id 455

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. upgrade to version 0.6alpha5

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?

i just started using this version and i love the time remaining estimate. however,
it seems that it takes a lot longer to for the "loading deck. please wait" dialog to
run. on a deck of 4,500 cards, it used to be about 3 seconds, and is now about 15 seconds.
also seems to take a lot longer moving from the card review mode back to the deck information
screen .


what version of ankidroid are you using? on what version of android?
0.6alpha5, but this was not an issue on 0.6alpha3

please provide any additional information below.

```

Index: 451
call screen : disable video scaling when its orientation is different than the container ones
place a video call between 2 devices in portrait orientation.
rotate one of the device in landscape, its video is scaled to fill the container oriented in portrait on the other device -> the zoom factor is too high

in this case the remote video should not be scaled to fill the container.

Index: 456
unable to locate in "device only" location mode and no prompt
**steps to reproduce**
1. set location mode to "device only" in android system
2. install good-weather and open app
3. click the location icon

**expected behavior**
prompt user to turn on high accuracy mode

**smartphone (please complete the following information):**
- device: galaxy a6s
- os: android 8.1.0
- version: 4.4

**reprodcuing video**
[https://youtu.be/whbqxjred-0](https://youtu.be/whbqxjred-0)

android provide two main location modes: high accuracy (using both the network and gps for location) and device only (using only gps for location). as shown in the video, it just hang in there locating after the reproducing steps. i have to cancel the locating process. but it worked smoothly when the locating mode is set to "high accuracy ".

it seems unfriedly to users in this scenario since the locating process seems infinite. so it would be nice to show a prompt to guide users to switch locating mode to "high accuracy " if there is no fix towards this issue.

thanks for your amzing app, anyway. i would really appreciate it to get your concern on this issue.
Index: 457
downloads should go the download folder
the current behavior:
mp3 files are saved into music folder
image files are saved into pictures folder
is wrong.

all downloads should go into download folder.
Index: 458
center send button vertically
if the composed message is longer than one line,
- the left icon (open emoji) is shown vertically-centered aligned
- the right icon (send message) is shown vertically-bottom aligned

currently, this looks weird.
i would suggest to center the send button also vertically as this has the advantage that it is more far away from the backspace key also avoids accidental clicks by the way.

**expected behavior**
the polinesia worker should be able to build improvements same as other civs + moai at the coast tiles

**additional context**
caused by 5117a9faa4b5b8b65e0aa71512a502cf200b83e1



Index: 464
auto resize picture
hello,

in an earlier version of wordpress for android i can set the default image size for the pic upload. in the latest new versions i must do these settings for every post and picture .

Index: 465
context menu disappears on device rotation
when i perform these sequences of events, the context menu on screen disappears:

sequence 1:
1. open drawer
2. long click on podcast element
3. orientation change

sequence 2:
1. open drawer
2. click on episodes
3. long click on episode item in list
4. orientation change

sequence 3:
1. open drawer
2. click on queue
3. long click on item in list
4. orientation change

Index: 466
main screen does not report approved apps when pin protection is enabled
superuser does not save details of any app approved while pin protection is enabled. logging is not affected.

Index: 467
landscape mode screen has black frame
i also have a landscape issue. ask v1.8.735 with no extensions.app:whatsapp, os:android 7.0, phone:samsung galaxy s7. settings:landscape full screen , word prediction on. how to get it: go landscape in whatsapp, start to write, screen ok. press the back key (ask disappears) and then touch the input field so ask is shown again. ask ui covered with a dark transparent frame on the right and bottom part.
Index: 468
hangs on "downloading required assets" then crashes

Index: 469
live site view breaks for published posts when site uses plain permalinks
### expected behavior

i expect to be able to view a blog post (published or draft) by tapping the "view" link in the post list.

### actual behavior

this behavior does not work as expected if a site uses plain permalinks (e.g. `?p=123`) instead of another permalink structure. (all other permalink structures i tried worked as expected.)

when i tap "view" for a draft post, the live site preview loads expected.

however, when i tap "view" for a published post, i get a blank screen and the error "links are disabled on the preview screen :

![2016-12-05 18 43 05](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8658164/20897628/05d7d6ba-bb1b-11e6-98d8-ab13579f8865.png)


### steps to reproduce the behavior

1. on a self-hosted wordpress site, go to settings > permalinks in the wp admin dashboard.
2. select "plain" for the permalink structure.
3. in the wordpress app, add that site (or select it from the site picker if it already exists).
4. open the blog posts and make sure the list of posts is synced.
5. find or create a draft post and select "view" ‚Äî result: you can preview the post as expected.
6. find or create a published post and select "view" ‚Äî result: you get a blank screen with the error noted above.

##### tested on nexus 9, android 7.0, wpandroid alpha-30

### checklist
checklist for quest suggestions (see guidelines):
- [x] üöß to be added tag is established and has a useful purpose
- [x] ü§î any answer the user can give must have an equivalent tagging (quest should not reappear to other users when solved by one)
- [x] üêøÔ∏è easily answerable by everyone from the outside but a survey is necessary
- [x] üí§ not an overwhelming percentage of elements have the same answer (no spam)
- [x] üïì applies to a reasonable number of elements (worth the effort)

Index: 475
probable memory leak
after a double background-foreground event of the applistactivity there are in heap memory 2 instances more of:

class fr.simon.marquis.preferencesmanager.roboto.robototextview @ 0x12cd9000
class fr.simon.marquis.preferencesmanager. ui .appadapter$headerviewholder @ 0x12e20580
class fr.simon.marquis.preferencesmanager. ui .appadapter$viewholder @ 0x12e20640

it should not be like this because the background-foreground events return to the same gui state and the memory should stay in the same state as well. it could be a symptom of a bad management of the onstart-onstop lifecycle.

i have encountered this problem on an android emulator running 7.1.1 os version.

Index: 479
square profile image setting ignored
since updating to the latest beta version on google play, the setting for square profile images is ignored. profile images appear as a circle regardless of the setting.

how to reproduce:
* go to settings -> appearance -> cards.
* set profile image style to square.
* restart twidere.

expected behavior:
* profile images are displayed as square images.

actual behavior:
* profile images remain displayed as circles throughout the app.

phone model: lg g4 (h815)
android version: 6.0
twidere version: 3.3.32 (google play beta)

screenshot: https://i.imgur.com/g60qgud.png

* version of the software you use : build 2.3, latest commit
* device / operating system : samsung s6, android 7.0

### the bug:
* what do you obtain? a copy of the error message or a screenshot is always useful.
selecting the "storage" option in "settings" (with night mode selected) opens a dialog box with text not visible.
![screenshot_20180313-112006](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32238400/37356534-769064cc-26a3-11e8-81e7-1cbfa9536685.png)

here's the image when night mode is off
![screenshot_20180313-112305](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32238400/37356536-77aad414-26a3-11e8-8553-5e0a585d773d.png)

#### steps to reproduce:

1. open "settings"
2. turn night mode "on"
3. tap on "storage"

#### expected behavior:

most probably, the bug is because the color and the header as well as the ok button are white and they are hidden in the white background.

ideally, in night mode, white text should be displayed in a grey dialog box, such that the color scheme matches that of the night mode

something like this is required:
![screenshot_20180313-224558](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32238400/37358179-a4c6f67c-26a7-11e8-9d0e-1cba0ed4c89f.png)

Index: 489
option to open direct links in the app

### actual behaviour
- opening direct links like https://cloud.example.com/f/12345 is not possible

### expected behaviour

i'm not sure if this is somehow possible on android, since nextcloud instances are hosted on custom domains, but maybe someone from @nextcloud/android has an idea. maybe we could extend the web ui with some button like "show in the client" that is shown on mobile and calls some custom url like: `nc://directlink/https://cloud.example.com/f/12345`

Index: 491
tags being removed or randomly added when < symbol is used
### expected behavior

i expected to be able to use symbols like < in tags for my posts.

### actual behavior

i'm seeing some strange behaviour when i include < in my tags. in all cases, the tag with < in it is removed by the app after saving my changes. in some cases, other tags have been added seemingly at random.

for example, you'll see i've added a `<3` to my tags in this screenshot:

![screenshot_20190108-2233013955308965084351350](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2998162/50863214-e08e7c80-1395-11e9-8286-daa8fb6d1f43.png)

after saving the above changes and returning to the post settings screen , i saw that not only was `<3` removed, but `testing` was also removed and three other tags had been added:

![screenshot_20190108-2233275684608566451407073](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2998162/50863497-bee1c500-1396-11e9-958b-3c8bd7c8fbd1.png)

### steps to reproduce the behavior

1. navigate to post editor and go through the steps to add new tags from the post settings screen .
2. include any tag that has a `<` symbol and save the changes.
3. navigate away from the post settings screen and then return to it.

##### tested on pixel, android alpha-144

possibly relevant past issues with numeric tags being removed from the app: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/wordpress-android/issues/8008

this was raised by a user in 1693771-zen who notes that they often see tags randomly disappearing from the app. the only reliable way i was able to reproduce the problem was when using tags with a `<` symbol, but there may be a wider problem here.

the user is locked into version 10.9.3 of the app as they're on android 4.4.2.

every time.

at the title)

version)

would help immensely: 1) install the "sendlog" app, 2) reproduce the crash,
3) immediately after, launch sendlog, 4) attach the resulting file to this
report. that will make the bug much easier to fix.

Index: 495
application icon / logo changes
please add support for icon shape
https://developer.android.com/guide/practices/ui_guidelines/icon_design_adaptive.html

Index: 496
reword buttons for yes/no (toilet/parking fee, constructions) quests


**use case**
when i solve the toilet fee quest, i want a clear description of the buttons, so i do not accidentally press the wrong button.

the problem is i cannot remember that question and also don't want to read it each time. the reason is it can be easily asked for that in two ways, i.e. "is it free?" and "does it cost money?".

**proposed solution**
as the usability problem of this is quite well known in the user/office programs space, i.e. "do you want to save this file? yes/no." and solved there; i would propose the same solution: rename the buttons to "free"/"not-free" or so.

Index: 497
issues in event details fragment
**describe the bug**
issues i found in event details fragment

- event feedback, event speaker, event sponsors api gets called on rotation.

- sponsors should be with name (what if image wouldn't load)

- if there is no sponsors, sponsor segment should be hidden or show "no sponsors".

- event topic api gets called after every second on event details fragment
(open event detail page and see the logs)

- log out -> open any event details -> click on write feedback -> navigate to login -> press back -> it will take you to event list not event details page


**would you like to work on the issue?**
- yes

at com.android.internal.os.zygoteinit$methodandargscaller.run(zygoteinit.java:793)
at com.android.internal.os.zygoteinit.main(zygoteinit.java:560)
at dalvik.system.nativestart.main(native method)

```

Index: 500
numeric row is always displayed from above and is not switched off
i went through all the settings but did not find an option to disable it.
it is strange that in the screenshots of the current keyboard when choosing a layout or setting the top row is always displayed as it should be - without the top row of numbers, but when you start printing, the top row of digits is displayed.

this is a problem for portrait mode with a small smartphone screen . i want to see more lines of input text, and i don't want to waste space on an unnecessary line of numbers.

android 4.4

lenovo a319

russian langpack
the problem always occurs, including before the installation of russian language packages.

Index: 502
text-to-speech doesn't replay for card templates with a mixture of text and fields
originally reported on google code with id 1297

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. set sounds preferences to "play sounds instantly" and "text to speech"
2. open a card that has a template containing some preset text + a field
3. press the "play" button after hearing the first reading

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?

expect to hear the entire card text replayed. instead, only the preset text is replayed
and all the fields are completely skipped.

does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?

every time

what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look
at the title)

v2.0beta11

on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version)

4.0.4

if it is a crash or "force close" and you can reproduce it, the following
would help immensely: 1) install the "sendlog" app, 2) reproduce the crash,
3) immediately after, launch sendlog, 4) attach the resulting file to this
report. that will make the bug much easier to fix.

n/a

please provide any additional information below.

example template: 'spanish term for "{{english}}"?'

in the above example, pressing the "play" button only replays "spanish term for..."
and then it stops. this seems to only happen if there is preset text in the template.
if the template contains only fields with no other text, i can replay the cards to
my heart's content.


```

reported by `dlnathaniel` on 2012-08-04 17:21:54

Index: 503
reader shows gallery instead of featured image
when a reader post has several images, we show a gallery of those images instead of showing the featured image . we should always show the featured image when one is assigned.

[this post](https://themechroblog.wordpress.com/2018/01/15/flawless-victory-fatality/) is an example of this. right now we show this instead of the featured image :



Index: 504
feature: possibility to add internet page to a home screen (pwa applications)
#### description

there is no possibilities to add a a page from firefox/chrome or [pwa](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-us/docs/web/progressive_web_apps) to a home screen . this is very important for the users, who uses pwa instead of regular apps.

this looks like launcher issue, because it's possible on other launchers

![ image ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3531135/69525769-1a924e00-0f69-11ea-95c8-0f81b557c904.png)

Index: 506
bug: long-tapping on a line of the card browser won't show a menu at first
_steps_
1. open ankidroid
2. tap "card browser" on the navigation drawer
3. select a deck which has many cards (ex. your "all decks")
4. exit ankidroid
5. open ankidroid again
6. tap "card browser" on the navigation drawer again
7. long-tap on a line (a card) of the list

ankidroid: 2.6alpha19
android: 4.3

Index: 507
[feature request] custom, language-specific top/bottom rows & symbol layouts
would it be possible to include language-specific, additional custom top/bottom rows in language packs? these should be switchable from anysoftkeyboard's ui settings, where the built-in rows are listed.

i'm asking this because i would like to have a more refined bottom row layout with some specific symbols. however, this row layout would only be useful and work well with a specific language, so adding these in ask's default bottom rows would not make sense. i'm aware that it's possible to specify a bottom row in the `keyboards.xml` of the languagepack template, but this means that the user can't then change the bottom row from the ask settings because the language pack is overriding it.

the same goes for the built-in symbol layout . different languages have different conventions and use different symbols. it would be the best to have language-specific symbol layouts defined in the language packs. it's rather cumbersome to cram all the possible symbols used in a language to the standard letter layout (even with pop-ups).

Index: 509
justified text causes problems
from user via play:

>the text in the some of the translations is 'justified', instead of 'left-aligned'. please check.

it seems that new justified layout does not work for all translations, so we need to disable it (and in the future make it configurable).




Index: 510
2.5.0 hangs if kodi is offline.
after upgrading from v2.4.7 to v2.5.0, kore hangs when kodi is offline.

f-droid, kore v2.4.7, v2.5.0
android 9
sm-t720

in the absence of an active network connection with kodi, kore 2.5.0 will hang if media libraries (for example, 'movies' or 'tv shows') are selected. the app is immediately unresponsive and after a few seconds the screen goes black. eventually, after about 15 seconds, the condition times out and the cached media thumbnails are displayed, as expected.

being able to conveniently review titles in my media collection - offline - is a feature that i use extensively and rely upon, often when i'm away from home (and kodi).

reverting back to kore v2.4.7 resolves the issue, with cached thumbsnails immediately viewable, with or without a network connection.
Index: 511
enable encryption by default in riotx when creating a private room
currently, when creating a private room, the default encryption is enabled only on riot desktop.

riot desktop :





riotx :

![create a new private room (riotx)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63846091/82878912-794a7b80-9f3c-11ea-80be-2ce1a324d531.jpeg)


**suggestions of features that could improve the user experience :**
- riotx : enable encryption by default when the user creates a private room
- riotx : disable encryption when the user creates a public room
- riotx : propose to add an alias when the user creates a public room
- riot desktop : add a button to publish the room in the room directory
- riotx and riot desktop : add a field to let user set a topic immediately after creating the room

mode pgp signature-seulement
dans ce mode, votre cl√© pgp sera utilis√©e pour cr√©er une signature cryptographique d\'un courriel non sign√©.
ce mode ne chiffre pas le courriel, mais certifie qu\'il a √©t√© envoy√© √† partir de votre cl√©.

Index: 516
media files are sometimes uploaded with path to local storage (aztec version)
we've been seeing a few reports of images being uploaded to the app with a path to local storage. for example:

`https://example.com/data/user/0/org.wordpress.android/cache/img_75591360079905.jpg`

there's a similar report to this in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/wordpress-android/issues/10203 which contains steps to replicate for the block editor. i'm separating this report out from the comments of that one, as we've also had reports from users who use aztec.

an example of such a report is in 2727375-zen. the user noted the following about their specific case:

* they upload images straight from their device to the post editor by tapping the + icon .
* they always wait for the image to finish uploading before making any other changes or navigating away from the editor.
* they also always make sure to manually save the post before exiting.
* they've been able to replicate the issue on multiple different connections, as they're travelling at the moment.
* their site is hosted on wordpress.com.
* they're using version 14.1 of the app and have a samsung sm-a505fn.

we've been unable to replicate the issue with the aztec editor so far, and it's unlikely the fix for https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/wordpress-android/issues/10203 will address the issues for aztec.

although we don't yet have steps to replicate, i wanted to create a report for further troubleshooting and gathering details.

Index: 518

greetings, im a graphics designer here on github and i would like to ask for your permission to design for your logo / icon that you maybe used for your future plans in your project. i want to help open source projects by designing logos or banners for there project. thank you for your time reading this

best regards
-jbeguna04
Index: 519
can't connect to site that uses https redirect
a user reported an issue with logging in to a site (http://www.androidpolice.com). the rsd response returned an https url but the site would redirect all https request to http. this confused the app and returned and ugly xml parser error in the app:

![screenshot_2013-11-11-13-20-32](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/789137/1518006/99bb96f2-4b2d-11e3-95b8-960b9492926b.png)

this was fixable by instructing the user to enter the full path to xmlrpc.php, but the app can probably be smarter about catching this issue and then trying the url again without using https.

Index: 520

user story:
my wife accidentally dismissed the call screen during a call, and was unable to navigate back to the call screen to toggle speakerphone/dialpad/call controls/etc.

Index: 526
adding su to stock /system partition
i have been attempting to add su to a stock sgs4 /system image (optus au). i can add the binary, set 6755 permissions, and rebuild and install the image . when su is executed it exits with return code 1 and does not trigger any ui or give root shell. i have manually run '/system/xbin/su --daemon &' and can see /system/xbin/su running as root in ps with ppid 1.

i have tried with market apk and with apk dropped into system/app folder. is there some init that i have missed? could you give me some pointers to chase this further please.

thanks
john

Index: 529
forward of files from shared folder not possible (only!) in app
### steps to reproduce
1. user a: create folder f and share with internal user b with all rights granted
2. user b: login into web interface with browser -> forward of arbitrary file from folder f is possible (clicking on icon (a) indicating that the file is owned by user a)
3. user b: open android app (newest/current version) using stored credentials of user b -> forward of thats same file is not possible (clicking on icon (a)) only opens detail menu allowing to copy via link

### expected behaviour
- the app should be able to forward not only files from folders created by oneself but from other users, too (if settings allow to do that) - like shown in "steps to reproduce" the web interface is able to do that

### actual behaviour
- as expected forwarding is possible via the web interface but not via the app.
- workaround in the app for user b: copy one file owned by user a in an arbitrary own folder (owned by user a). magic: suddenly it is possible to forward that exact file and at the same time another icon is used by the app (not circle with first char of username but sharing- icon )

### environment data
android version: 10

device model: sony zx2 compact

stock or customized system: stock

nextcloud app version: 3.10.1

nextcloud server version: 17.0.3

- tap to refresh the list

Index: 536
[feature request] - swap the sidebars (bookmarks left, tabs right), tabs bottom align
hello,

i love the browser, however i am right handed person (guess as most people) and i find it extremely difficult to use it as such - i hold the phone in my right hand. the most common action is to open new tab, switch tab, close tab. i hardly ever use bookmarks.

it would be so much better to have tabs available via right swipe and bookmarks via left swipe than how it is today. also, it would be really nice if the list of tabs could stick on the bottom of the screen rather than top as that would make them much more accessible via the right hand thumb.

i completely appreciate that it may not work for everybody so would be awesome to add 2 new options:
1) swap the tabs and bookmarks (this would put tabs to right and bookmarks right)
2) align tabs to bottom (this would align the list of opened tabs to the bottom of the screen )

i am absolutely ok to keep the layout of the top bar (no need to swap things there if that's not easy).

i was looking at the code and this really should be fairly simple change.

what do you think? doable?

Index: 542
bookmark color doesn't appear when speak bookmark is on a verse...
when a verse contains a speak bookmark (the red ear icon ) setting a bookmark on a verse doesn't show the default bookmark color until the speak bookmark is removed from that verse.
to duplicate:
1) set the default bookmark color to yellow.
2) set speak automatic bookmarking. (from the speak setting menu)
3) speak a verse and stop the speak.
4) tap and hold on the verse to select it.
5) from the top menu tap on the bookmark icon to color the verse.

what happens:
the verse is not colored with the default bookmark color due to an ear icon .

expected result:
regardless of a speak bookmark on a verse the verse should show the bookmark color .
