Index: 545
mail sync stuck after some days with dovecot/postfix
**delta chat version**
problem present since at least 0.12.0
using 0.17.3 fdroid build

**expected behavior**
polling of new imap messages and delivering messages via smtp

**actual behavior**
we have not really daily chats driven on the server (lots of normal mail though)
, but after some message it suddenly stops updating imap incoming and smtp outgoing is stuck.
i see a
jun 3 13:14:47 srv04 dovecot: imap(username): disconnected: disconnected in idle in=23250 out=77499
as a last imap related message and sign of life of the push client in the logs
yet! there are new messages incoming after this time on this very day showing up the client
jun 5 21:48:29 srv04 dovecot: lda(username): msgid=: saved mail to inbox
then just zero imap login attempts in the next days.

the next time i tried to send a message on jun 8 to no avail - it is stuck in the client and never reaches the server (log). i have to kill the client and restart - then all fine again for some weeks

**steps to reproduce the problem**

1. use client with prefer encrypted enabled on all chat partners
2. don't be able to sent mails after some weeks :)

** screen snapshots**

**debug logs**
i'll have to add these later on the next occurrence as the client was restarted and as i see all older data is lost (attaching current log with one sent message anyway)
this though is applicable beyond android version and phone model
i have three cellphones where this happens: mi max2 miui 9.5,lg flex2 6.something and some old samsung galaxy express with 5.x (i think)
all connecting to the same server.

if applicable, debug logs can be copied from within the delta chat app:
open the _settings_ menu -> _about_ -> _version number|info_.

versioncode=520


dovecot 1:2.2.13-12~deb8u4
postfix 2.11.3-1+deb8u2
with policyweightd,postgrey,clamav and opendkim

main.cf:
# mailboxes
mailbox_size_limit = 0
message_size_limit = 209715200
recipient_delimiter = +
home_mailbox = maildir/
#mailbox_command = procmail -a "$extension"
mailbox_command = /usr/lib/dovecot/deliver
virtual_transport = dovecot
# dovecot_destination_recipient_limit = 1
maildrop_destination_recipient_limit = 1
maildrop_destination_concurrency_limit = 1

# smtp auth
smtpd_sasl_type = dovecot
smtpd_sasl_path = private/auth
smtpd_sasl_auth_enable = yes
smtpd_sasl_authenticated_header = yes
# header_checks = pcre:/etc/postfix/obscure_smtp_auth

# antispam tweaks
smtpd_delay_reject = yes
smtpd_helo_required = yes
#smtpd_helo_restrictions = permit_mynetworks, reject_non_fqdn_helo_hostname, reject_invalid_helo_hostname, permit
smtpd_helo_restrictions = permit_mynetworks, reject_invalid_helo_hostname, permit
disable_vrfy_command = yes
strict_rfc821_envelopes = yes

smtpd_sender_restrictions = permit_mynetworks,permit_sasl_authenticated,reject_non_fqdn_sender,reject_unknown_sender_domain,reject_invalid_hostname,reject_unauth_destination
smtpd_recipient_restrictions = permit_mynetworks,permit_sasl_authenticated,reject_non_fqdn_recipient,reject_unknown_recipient_domain,reject_unauth_pipelining,reject_unauth_destination,check_sender_access hash:/etc/postfix/sender_access,check_recipient_access hash:/etc/postfix/custom_replies, check_policy_service inet:127.0.0.1:12525,check_policy_service inet:127.0.0.1:10023
unknown_local_recipient_reject_code = 554

# dkim milter
milter_default_action = accept
# milter_protocol = 2
smtpd_milters = inet:localhost:8891 unix:/clamav/clamav-milter.ctl
non_smtpd_milters = inet:localhost:8891 unix:/clamav/clamav-milter.ctl

Index: 550
collabora can't edit on android
### actual behaviour
when opening openoffice documents via the nextcloud app, collabora android client opens the document, but can only open it as read only.

when opening the document from a browser edit works.

### expected behaviour
when i open the document i'd expect collabora to be able to edit and save it into nextcloud.

### steps to reproduce
1. open any .ods stored on a nextcloud instance from the android client with collabora android
2. observe that it is not editable

### environment data
android version: 9, security patch: 1 november 2019
kernel: 4.4.153-perf# build number: 00ww_4_14f_sp03

device model: nokia 8 sirocco model ta-1005

stock or customized system: stock android one

nextcloud app version: 3.9.2

nextcloud server version: 17.0.1

collabora app version: 4.1.99
collabora server version: 6.2-1
loolwsd: 4.2.0


![screenshot_20191217-172806](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39059618/71014792-cc4d1680-20f2-11ea-85e0-07669ad1b2de.png)

edit:
as per #3329 i already have set /hosting/capabilities to be proxied to the docker image .
```
location ^~ /hosting/capabilities {
proxy_pass https://localhost:9980;
proxy_set_header host $http_host;
}
```
i've tried reinstalling both android apps, but it didn't help.

```
curl https:///hosting/capabilities
{"convert-to":{"available":true},"hasmobilesupport":true,"hastemplatesaveas":false,"hastemplatesource":true,"productname":"collabora online development edition"}%
```

edit2:

after digging some, appears that [loolwsd.cpp](https://github.com/libreoffice/online/blob/master/wsd/loolwsd.cpp#l3021) sets `hastemplatesaveas` to `false` whereas @tobiaskaminsky stated earlier [here](https://help.nextcloud.com/t/collabora-online-developer-edition-4-0-is-here-edit-documents-on-mobile-and-more/43484/33) that it is expected to be `true`.

i wonder if this can be the source of the problem?

Index: 553
design proposals
first of all: newpipe is so great! i really like it so my criticism is "grumbling at a high level" as we say in germany. newpipe looks good. but i want it to look _**best**_. so i've decided to make the following design proposals. unfortunately, i have no clue how to design an android app so i can only contribute some example images.

# **1) better context menu**
in my opinion, it takes the user too long to understand what all the options mean. the context menu lacks good distinguishability of the individual items. so this is my proposal: add icons, group the items and put the share option as an icon to the top. also, the video title needs to be really emphazised because it just gets kinda lost. by the way: those are bootstrap icons. i created the last 2 ones myself from existing ones. and maybe make the edges more rounded.

![newpipe new context menu](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52963327/88476588-fdaf7f80-cf28-11ea-96db-bdc164937398.png)

# **2) swipe to delete home tab**
you can delete a home tab by dragging/sliding it in the settings to the right out of the window. there should be a red indicator.

![newpipe swipe to delete](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52963327/88468764-de3c3680-ced7-11ea-92a3-2fa93138fb3b.png)

# **3) peertube instances**
in the left menu you can select peertube as the video source. but if you have several peertube instances newpipe gives you this little really annoying dropdown menu which i'd like to have replaced by a grouped/seperated list.

![newpipe peertube](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52963327/88468846-bbf6e880-ced8-11ea-9ee5-4635bc47c08a.png)

# **4) pull to refresh**
please add the option to pull-refresh the feed tab. searching and unsuccessfully tapping the little, little reload button is sooo annoying.

![newpipe pull to refresh](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52963327/88468880-2f005f00-ced9-11ea-8d16-a09bf1d240d6.png)

thanks for your work! love it
Index: 554
over 100% download status, more than the video's size





### version

- newpipe v. 0.19.8

### steps to reproduce the bug




### expected behavior

1. instead of transcribing the downloaded video newpipe will continue to download over. eg. the video size is 100mb but when this happens newpipe will still continue to use data connection and still download @ 160mb or so. (you can actually see it on the screenshot.üôÇ)
2. the downloaded file will get corrupt sometimes loss of metadata or irr.
### actual behaviour

1. newpipe forgot that it goes over the expected size and percentage.
2. even the video goes over 100% download status, you can go to file manager and you'll still able to play the video perfectly. (i still didn't know if newpipe given enough time will overwrite the downloaded video)
### screenshots/ screen recordings

![screenshot_2020-08-05-08-03-23-86](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50725388/89361071-df057180-d6fc-11ea-9f0e-af8fae59647d.png)

i thought this bug only persist on the early newpipe debug application v. 0.19.8 but it's not it is still on official 0.19.8 application.

Index: 555
home tab: add options to pin (or not) missed notifications and unread messages
add two options to let the user decide about pinning or not the missed notifcations and the unread messages.


- the two options are:
* **pin rooms with missed notifications**: if enabled, rooms with a badge will be displayed first
* **pin rooms with unread messages**: if enabled, rooms with unread messages (name in bold) will be displayed first
if both are enabled, rooms with badge will be displayed before rooms with unread messages.
- both should be disable by default.
- these options should be added in the setting screen .
- the values for these options are cleared when the user signs out

Index: 557
pictures exif location info gets modified when uploaded by "share to" from galleries
### steps to reproduce
1. choose a picture from the gallery with valid exif location data
2. choose share and then select nextcloud app
3. select folder on nc server and upload

### expected behaviour
- the picture will be uploaded unmodified with valid exif data

### actual behaviour
- the picture will be modifiied and the exif location data will be set to an invalid value (0/0, 0/0, 0/0 for long and lat). when uploaded directly from nextcloud the geotags won't be modified and the file is identical to the original file. i would expect that the file is identical when sending through the gallery instead of the nc app itself. tried is with several apps, it seems the "share" mechanism of android "sanitizes" the picture somehow.
i can't reproduce it with a samsung s8+ and android 9.

### environment data
android version: 10

device model: samsung galaxy s10+ (sm-g975f)

stock or customized system: stock

nextcloud app version: 3.12.1

nextcloud server version: 19.0.1

reverse proxy:

Index: 558
distribute the java classes into packages
originally reported on google code with id 220

```
we have 35 java classes in src.com.ichi2.anki and it starts to take a bit of time when
looking for a class or to understand which set of classes is involved in which area.

to make it more maintainable and attractive to developers, i suggest distributing the
classes into a few packages.

what packages should it be?
- maybe srs+database code into a package
- then network-related things like shared decks and sync
- the ui would probably have its own

notes:
ankidroidapp.java must stay at the same place to avoid install-time problems.
move files using "git mv path destination".
```

reported by `nicolas.raoul` on 2010-09-17 04:01:21

Index: 559
introduce unit testing
* choose a unit test framework
* introduce it to the code base
* make a few unit tests to demo the framework
* secure the code coverage works fine with the unit tests, cf #1175
* introduce the unit testing in the ci (for each pr, before integration/ ui automated tests)
* document how to make new unit tests (if not obvious)
Index: 560
official ttorrent support
ttorrent has a web interface that clones the qbittorrent look and behaviour, including the its api. however, they are (certainly with the recent qbittorrent web interface changes and issues) not 100% compatible and as such it would be good to add a proper implementation and support.

originally reported on google code with id 1794

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. merely sync the deck after inputting your account details and a failure occurs.
2. attempting the 'repair database' option causes the entire app to crash.
3.

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?

1. an error occurs, labelled: ad-20130704014131.stacktrace


does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?

1. yes. every time. this is separate from the repair database crashing however - as
an error is created doing this, where attempting to repair the database just crashes
the app. (i think they're linked? same problem?)
2. i have tried using a second dummy account and the problem still occurs.

what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look
at the title)

version: v2.0.1
on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version)
v2.1.0 - nook hd+ model number: bntv600

sendlog attached

please provide any additional information below.

i know the b&n nook runs an awkward version of android (or, at least i think it does)
i've had to reformat the nook a couple of times, and have tried using the app while
rooted and not rooted (no hardware settings have been changed, the nook is currently
rooted, but doesn't use any root apps(although some are installed but do not have superuser
permissions))
if there's anything else i can do to help, let me know, i'll camp the report for a
month until giving up on a response :)
```

Index: 566
hard to find the "room directory" button
when i first used riot, i went straight into a room.

then i couldn't work out how to get back out!

it took ages of exploring every button to find the tiny folder icon . the four icons down there are very small and cryptic for primary interface .

some suggestions:

1) put the "room directory" command at the top of the list of rooms in the very visible sidebar above.
2) i guess then the "create new room" could go in the same place. and "start chat" in the section for "people".
3) make all those icons a bit larger and clearer, preferably with text not just icons.
Index: 567
text-to-speech not found on samsung note 3
originally reported on google code with id 1881

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. turn on text-to-speech in preferences
2. open a deck and chose 'start reviewing'
3. problem occurs

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?

it will do one of two things. either it will (1) have a pop-up with an exclamation
point that says "text-to-speech: no text-to-speech language available" and continue
to review, or (2) go to a black screen and then after a while say "unfortunately, ankidroid
has stopped". if it does option number 2, then going to preference and reseting text-to-speech
seems to help some, but instead of going to the blank screen and exiting it doesn't
work it just goes to option 1 again...


does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?

happens every single time, either (1) or (2)...yet there may have been some kind of
initial problems with the setup because i haven't gotten to work at all yet. it seems
to work fine without text-to-speech though.

what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look
at the title)
on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version)

2.0.1

if it is a crash or "force close" and you can reproduce it, the following
would help immensely: 1) install the "sendlog" app, 2) reproduce the crash,
3) immediately after, launch sendlog, 4) attach the resulting file to this
report. that will make the bug much easier to fix.

i'm not sure if it is...if it goes to option 2 it opens up a problem window and lets
me send a report somewhere. not sure where it goes but i sent one.

please provide any additional information below.

i have a samsung galaxy note 3...just got it a few days ago. has an sd card in it.
i installed the hq samsung voices, not sure if they have anything to do with it.
```

Index: 571
editing a post with 'more' tag causes extra whitespace
unconfirmed, from user email:
when editing a post with
the --more-- tag in it, each time it's opened extra white space is added
before and after. as this affects how the post is formatted when viewed in
a browser, it has to be fixed every time a minor edit is done.

tested this a bit. i'm not 100% sure this is what the user meant but i noticed that if i have a post content that looks like this in the web editor:
this is some text before the more tag
test test
this is some text after.
it shows up like this in the android editor:
this is some text before the more tag
test



test
this is some text after.
publishing without removing the carriage returns changes the post layout .

Index: 572
clean the main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi directory
we should only have the app icon there. other xxxhdpi resources should go to `wordpress/src/future/res/drawable-xxxhdpi` for a future use (and eventually have distinct apks).

Index: 577
please make it work on android tv
### steps to reproduce
1. install apk on android tv.
2. set ask as keyboard input.
3. try to type, e.g. search field.

### expected behavior
when tv input requires typing, ask keyboard opens at bottom of the screen . you should be able to select letters with tv remote.

### actual behavior
when tv input requires typing, ask keyboard opens at bottom of the screen . but the tv's input focus does not move the keyboard; it remains on the search field. so you cannot type. or select letters.

**android os version:**
android tv

**device manufacturer and model:**
sony android tv

**list of installed add-ons (like languages, or themes):**
ask, shenafu's language pack
Index: 578
now playing
first of all, nice project...
but, i would like to see a `now playing` layout as this
![screenshot_20190209-102408](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26210471/52520437-81f54080-2c6a-11e9-950f-1b981514d56f.png)
i happen to understand that you are not going to be pulling individual artwork image (s) for songs because you want music player go to be as lightweight as possible and i totally understand. so, instead of having a fullscreen `now playing` layout as the one above, you could just get rid of the image (artwork) area and make the `now playing` layout a bottomsheet that looks as if it's docked when it pops up. something like this
![img_20190209_125517](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26210471/52520626-bddcd580-2c6b-11e9-9ca0-967cb20c45c4.jpg)
well, point is we need a layout like that, something that provides the use of all the player controllers needed (pause/play, forward, next, backward, previous, repeat-on/off, shuffle-on/off), the `now playing` layout should also show the song name, artiste name and album name...

ps: the current `player_controls_panel` can still be the way it is. just providing the ability to show the `now playing` layout when the `player_info` **linearlayout** on the `player_controls_panel` is clicked on...

Index: 580
no new mail notification
please search to check for an existing issue (including closed issues, for which the fix may not have yet been released) before opening a new issue: https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/issues?q=is%3aissue

### expected behavior
sound and light blink notification when new mail arrives. been using k9 for years, on many different phones, with no issues. this issue started about a week ago.

### actual behavior
mail arrives, not notification at all, no sound, no light blink, no vibration, no email icon . only know there is new mail by going into app and looking at each account to see new mail.

### steps to reproduce
1. after reading on existing issue i thought it was related to the quiet time setting. turned quiet time off, still no mail notification.
2.rebooted phone, no mail notification
3.notifications were working up until about a week ago. all other phone notifications are working, i.e. text sounds, phone ring sound, new news alerts, etc.

### environment
k-9 mail version: 5.403

android version: 8.1.0 security patch feb. 5, 2018

account type (imap, pop3, webdav/exchange): 14 separate imap accounts, none of the accounts are receiving notifications. phone type = pixel 2. new mail notifications were working on this phone up to about a week ago.

Index: 581
full download sync fails - low on memory
originally reported on google code with id 1173

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. remove everything related to ankdroid 1/2
2. install alpha 41
3. start sync
4. when asked for direction of full sync, pick download
5. ankidroid complains about broken collection

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?
the collection is downloaded.

does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?
i tried restarting several times, same thing

what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look at the title)
alpha 40
on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version)
cyanogen with android 2.3.7

please provide any additional information below.

after looking in ankidroid folder on the phone the collection file (collection.anki2)
was there but only 32kb of it (not sure about contents, but filesize was exactly 32768)
coping it manually from pc make everything work. triggering sync downloaded missing
media.
```

reported by `msylwester` on 2012-06-16 00:28:51

Index: 582

Index: 587
ui controls too small in the 'edit card' screen
originally reported on google code with id 257

```
i have general ui suggestions on how to improve the 'edit card' screen .
1- the save button is too small, and too close to cancel. worse yet, if i use my right
thumb to hit save, i partially cover the area where cancel is. the result is that it's
very easy to hit cancel accidentally. this sucks when i have spent a couple of minutes
writing a very ellaborate card.

2- the 'to' area is tiny too, and hard to hit. there's no reason not to make it bigger.

these two issues are perfect examples of fitts's law:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/fitts's_law

what version of the product are you using? on what operating system?
android, ankidroid-0.5alpha8-sync-experimental.apk
```

reported by `quesada` on 2010-11-25 09:22:48

Index: 588
feature request: option to use physical source of (entropy e.g. dice) for password generation
**is your feature request related to a problem? please describe.**
rather than rely on device prng, it would be good to have an option to input the results of physical dicerolls for the password generator.

**describe the solution you'd like**
when generating a new password, have a screen to input results of sequential rolls of a 6 sided die (see screenshot below). as more rolls are entered, have some kind of indicator of the strength of the password that will be generated from this number of rolls.

**describe alternatives you've considered**
[diceware password generator from fdroid](https://f-droid.org/packages/com.aptasystems.dicewarepasswordgenerator) has this option but it only creates wordlist/diceware passphrases. that's where the following screenshot is from. the project was [last updated in 2018](https://github.com/jeffisaak/diceware-pass-gen), but maybe there's an api the two apps can use to communicate. it also already implements diceware passphrase generation(#218 )

**additional context**

![screenshot_2020-07-17-09-37-11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30786326/87792048-50928400-c811-11ea-9cf6-15dad8bc2ac4.png)

Index: 590
peertube integration to youtube rss feed.




#### describe the feature you want



since peertube supports rss and newpipe already can play peertube videos, shulden't it be possible to add not only youtube channels, but peertube instances to the rss feed too?
so that you have videos from both platforms seamless integrated in the "what's new"-section.

#### is your feature request related to a problem? please describe it




i think youtube's monopoly position is so hard to break because they have all content in one space. it dosn't matter if there are alternatives. as long as people hanging around on youtube(because not every content is available on alternative plattforms), they will watch videos on youtube, even if they are available on other platforms, because they are on youtube anyway.





#### how will you/everyone benefit from this feature?




this feature could make the "what's new"-feed a single place where everything you want/need comes together, but a bit more platform independent.
Index: 591
double tap to mark an item as "starred"
double tab an item (in the detail view) to mark it as read.

reason: especially on larger devices it is hard to reach the navigation bar in order to click on the "star" icon . a simple double-tab would make this way easier (similar to instagram).
Index: 592
in traditional chinese (zh-tw) interface , simplified chinese (zh-cn) is wrongly used in filters. v2.3.1.
@nkartyshov
@ameshkov

1. i tried v2.3.1 and found that simplified chinese (zh-cn) is wrongly used in filters.
screenshot:

![ image ](https://i.imgur.com/wzpvchk.png)



you should use **zh-tw** for filters in traditional chinese interface .
ag content blocker uses very old filters database since this is early fixed in ag for android v2.11.
https://github.com/adguardteam/adguardforandroid/issues/1762

2. additionally, those filters also use outmoded filters' names and descriptions, ex: english filter and spyware filter...etc.
english filter -> base filter
spyware filter -> tracking protection filter

**is it possible to use the latest filters database such as ag for android v3?**
(if it's not easy to realize in ag content blocker v2.3, you should first give the traditional chinese translations of filters in ag for android v2.12 to ag content blocker v2.3.)

thanks.

Index: 596
ankidroid does not handle muli-line latex in card templates
originally reported on google code with id 1935

```
what steps will reproduce the problem?
1. add latex code to a template separating lines using the enter key i.e. use more
than one line
2. sync, view in ankidroid

what is the expected output? what do you see instead?
it is expected the latex code will be rendered properly (or it will show a picture
rendered with the desktop cliet). however, what you see is the latex code e.g. [latex]\begin{align*}
etc.

does it happen again every time you repeat the steps above? or did it
happen only one time?
every time


what version of ankidroid are you using? (decks list > menu > about > look
at the title) 2.02
on what version of android? (home screen > menu > about phone > android
version) 4.2.1
```

Index: 597
auto-hide streetcomplete title bar
the big blue bar at the top of streetcomplete is "stealing" precious vertical space. in portrait mode, that may not be that bad, but in landscape mode it really ~sucks~ is not that nice.
and the only thing it shows is the app title and some things of minor importance.

my idea would be to auto-hide it, so that it disappears on a tap on the screen e.g. ‚Äì similar to how things are hidden when playing a video in most apps.

related: https://github.com/westnordost/streetcomplete/issues/402

Index: 600
auto update doesn't work (yalp installed from yalp-store-ota-contemporary-43.zip)
i flashed yalp ota in july and have following options ticked (translated back from german gui ):
- download to internal memory
- search for updates: daily
- download new updates
- only wifi
- install new updates (root)
- using whitelist (with a lot of apps on it)
- automatic whitelist
- install apps immediately
- delete apk after installation
- install method: use system privileges

i would expect that yalp loads updates in background but it doesn't.

when i check for updates from time to time there are always updates on the list that were released weeks ago.

i have this behaviour on 5 different (rooted) devices running lineageos 13, 14.1 and 15.1.

is there some misunderstanding on my side? whats for example the difference between "use system privileges" and "use root"? what options should i tick to enable automatic updates?

Index: 610
no k-9 icon on the always on display
please search to check for an existing issue (including closed issues, for which the fix may not have yet been released) before opening a new issue: https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/issues?q=is%3aissue

### expected behavior
an icon of k-9 remains on the always on display (aod) after each arrival of a notification

### actual behavior
my xiaomi mi9t's own always-on-display (aod) feature allows only a few 3rd party apps to display notifications there, e.g. whatsapp, gmail (k-9 too, but only with a customized rom called xiaomi.eu).
hence i installed an app that does it better ("[always on amoled](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.newgen.alwayson)"). so far, it shows every notification of all apps (a weather app, a banking app, etc.), **excepting k-9**!
notifications from k-9 appear on the lock screen , but not on the aod. for an adjustable, short time edge lighting is even signaling on the aod the notification (like for notifications of the other apps), but no icon is displayed to remain on the aod.
according to the [faq](http://www.newgenmobile.net/faq/index.html) of the aod app:
> each notification has its action buttons that were programed but the developers of the app that is sending the notification. 99% of the actions buttons will work, but there are some that wont work. that is not the amoled fault but more of how the developer of that app designed those action buttons.

therefore, i suppose something in k-9 was omitted, probably its icon is not provided properly (there is no need for action icons, every app show also only its icon displayed also in the status bar).

### steps to reproduce
1. activate always on display and allow k-9 to show notifications on the lock screen
2. send an e-mail that k-9 should show up in the folder without manually refreshing
3. no k-9 icon is displayed on the aod

### environment
k-9 mail version: 5.704

android version: 10

account type (imap, pop3, webdav/exchange): imap

please take some time to [retrieve logs](https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/wiki/loggingerrors) and attach them here:

Index: 617
allow editeventactivity to run over the lock screen
i use a [lockscreen app](https://github.com/achep/acdisplay) that i've [modified](https://github.com/smichel17/acdisplay) to include a shortcut for creating a new calendar appointment.

i'd like to be able to add the event without unlocking my device. i'm currently doing this by allowing etar to run over the lock screen with [xposed app settings](https://github.com/rovo89/xposedappsettings). however, i don't really want the entire application to do this; just the editeventactivity.

you can do this with `getwindow().addflags(layoutparams.flag_show_when_locked)`.

however, i'm fairly new to android development and couldn't figure out how to add this property to the editeventactivity only (i think i found the right place, in `oncreate` in [editeventactivity.java](https://github.com/xsoh/etar-calendar/blob/master/src/com/android/calendar/event/editeventactivity.java), but i ran into issues where adding the required dependencies didn't fix dependency errors and i'm not sure why).

info **is** updated after screen turns off (inactivity), after scrolling the item off- screen or changing screens (go to feed view, for example).
expected behaviour to give immediate feedback that the playback position was reset.

Index: 625
misleading snackbar message on page load fail retry
could not investigate the reason and/or if it can cover something more, but while looking into this [push notifications pr](https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/wordpress-android/pull/12184) i noticed the following

### expected behavior
when a page upload fails, we present a system notification. if user taps on the notification, the pages list is opened (while the page upload is being retried) and a snackbar is presented saying something like "page upload retrying" or something similar.

### actual behavior
when a page upload fails, we present a system notification. if user taps on the notification, the pages list is opened (while the page upload is being retried) and a snackbar is presented saying "the selected page is not available"

### steps to reproduce the behavior
- create a new page and force the upload fail (one way is using the breakpoint feature of charles proxy configuring a breakpoint like this
![ image ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47797566/87831195-0d70f900-c883-11ea-8b27-211f95dd9791.png)
where is the site id of the site you are using to upload the page
- once the upload fail, notice the upload fail notification is shown
![ image ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47797566/87831299-6ccf0900-c883-11ea-8ea1-2a0a925db3ff.png)

- tap on the notification and check you get the snackbar saying "the selected page is not available"

##### tested on [pixel 3 emu], android [api 29], wpandroid [alpha-234]

Index: 626
input mode problem with arrow keys
i have a phone with a physical keyboard (xperia pro). unfortunately, it looks like the arrow-keys on the keyboard are handled as "trackball" by android-vnc-viewer. so, the only input mode, in which the arrow-keys work, is "mouse control mode"; but then, panning the screen is not possible. this means that i constantly have to switch input modes to use arrow-keys/pan the screen .

suggested solution:
- add a input mode, which behaves like the standard-mode "touch mouse pan and zoom", but send arrow-key events for the trackball (which are actually the arrow-keys on my physical keyboard).
or
- add a checkbox: [x] send arrow-key events for the trackball
which modifies the input-modes.

all ui elements have wrong sizes and locations. some more obvious than others, such as the search bar for food items, and tne plus icon at the lower right etc.

## steps to reproduce
1. in android, go to system settings / display, and set display size to smallest and font size to large.
2. open app.

i use my phone with low "display size" and higher "font size" settings to cram more content in the screen . this works well with most apps s.t. the ui elements get scaled to become smaller and more content (lists, texts etc.) will be in the screen , rather than buttons, status bars etc.

Index: 634
reader settings: unfollowing a site and making a configuration change removes it from list of followed sites
this issue was raised while reviewing #11343

### expected behavior
in reader > settings > followed sites, when unfollow a site and make a configuration change, we want the unfollowed site to remain listed.

### actual behavior
in reader > settings > followed sites, when unfollow a site and make a configuration change, we get the unfollowed site is removed from the list.

### steps to reproduce the behavior
- go to reader settings
- select the followed sites tab
- unfollow a followed site and make a device screen rotation
- check that the unfollowed site is removed from the list

Index: 638
bt connect feature not working in android 4.2
```
while i have not yet confirmed this, code leveraged from this project is used
in a2dp connect. a2dp connect does not return the interface from ibluetooth or
ibluetootha2dp. see details here:
http://code.google.com/p/a2dp-connect/issues/detail?id=11

```

Index: 641
tapping on document details preview shows another file
hi,

when tapping on a document (pdf or image ) it should show it in a bigger view so that i can also zoom on it.
the issue is that in my case, when i tap one file, it shows another file the other view, not the current right one.
i have discovered it shows the previously opened one.
to summarize it:

1. open document a from list view;
2. when in preview, click on it;
3. it should show a detailed view of the same file, not of another one.

thanks for your work, i hope you can fix it soon!
regards

Index: 646
error displayed after download sync or auto-sync in downloads screen

this is a commonly reported error with no apparent side affects which i just caught because i could not reproduce it. however, i have finally reproduced it. the error is caused by a prior closedbyinterruptexception during filechannel.transferfrom when moving the downloaded font.properties file. however it seems unrelated to the font.properties download. i suspect that when any error occurs fetching a repo's book list android then attempts to interrupt the thread and the first interruptible command is transferfrom.

i have attempted the simple fix of replacing transferfrom with a simple file copy loop.

error:
java.lang.exception: jsword exception
at net.bible.service.sword.swordenvironmentinitialisation$1.showmsg(swordenvironmentinitialisation.java:115)
at net.bible.service.sword.swordenvironmentinitialisation$1.reportmessage(swordenvironmentinitialisation.java:96)
at org.crosswire.common.util.reporter.firecapture(reporter.java:176)
at org.crosswire.common.util.reporter.informuser(reporter.java:139)
at net.bible.service.download.genericfiledownloader.downloadfile(genericfiledownloader.java:99)
at net.bible.service.font.fontcontrol.checkfontpropertiesfile(fontcontrol.java:150)
at net.bible.android.control.download.downloadcontrol.getdownloadabledocuments(downloadcontrol.java:116)
at net.bible.android.view.activity.download.download.getdocumentsfromsource(download.java:118)
at net.bible.android.view.activity.base.documentselectionbase$4.doinbackground(documentselectionbase.java:255)
at net.bible.android.view.activity.base.documentselectionbase$4.doinbackground(documentselectionbase.java:241)
at android.os.asynctask$2.call(asynctask.java:292)
at java.util.concurrent.futuretask.run(futuretask.java:237)
